name: Idle Run
description: Idle run is an idle game where your main goal to is run faster and faster by killing enemies, crafting new gear, unlock new recipes, pets, zones and earn achievements!

name: Cybertrash Statyx
description: Cyberthrash Statyx is tactical 2D action-platformer. Run, jump, slide, destroy enemies, gain experience points, upgrade your character - Jenet which trying escape from corporation.

name: Cabin of Shadows: Dueling Impostors
description: You and one other survivor have escaped to an abandoned cabin in the woods after your village was attacked by a werewolf. Is the person before you truly human? Or could your sole companion be the very same monster that slaughtered everyone you know?

name: Quack my Duck
description: Caution, we've lost our ducks! Help John find all the ducks scattered around the city. An exciting hidden object adventure game for all ages.

name: The Guest
description: The Guest is a first-person psychological horror game that focuses on creating fear and tension for the player.

name: Axe Party VR
description: VR Axe Games

name: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival
description: Squeeks: Trickshot Festival is a cutesy physics puzzle game where you have to deliver to the destination as many adorable little chickens as possible. One more thing, Squeeks love to clump up, so what are you waiting for - let’s get rolling!

name: RootKeeper
description: Unknown Warrior, pick up your weapons, plant a variety of plants, resist the surging monsters, and protect the Holy Tree!

name: Elemancer
description: Master all 5 elements in this natural movement VR elemental brawler. Choose from hundreds of different attacks to create your own unique bending style.

name: Hank: The Great Unraveling
description: Lucrom City’s notorious asylum has been overrun by a recently caught sadistic mastermind - the Unraveler. He’s willing to negotiate before he starts killing the hostages on one condition. He gets to speak to one person - Hank, his captor.

name: Polyroll Pocket
description: An all new, Pocket-Sized adventure starring Polyroll! Kaiser Kiwi has landed on the moon with a diabolical plan to wipe out the Polyrolls. You'll need to uncover secrets, reclaim the stolen batteries from Kiwi's goons, and power up your rocket ship to blast off for the final confrontation!

name: Viral Fear
description: Step into the shoes of a daring live streamer in Viral Fear, a spine-chilling 1 to 4 player co-op adventure. Stealthily maneuver through the woods, destroy ritual skulls, and unravel the secrets of the cult to vanquish the nightmarish entity.

name: Orbit Express
description: Orbit Express is a physics-based roguelike game. Pilot your delivery spacecraft through a procedurally generated galaxy, creating a unique challenge every time you play. Avoid collisions, upgrade your craft, mind your fuel, and master your flying skills, all for a minimum wage!

name: Boat Party
description: Boat Party is a vibrant, four-player, competitive party game full of fun and unique games! Play with your friends, online or locally!

name: Errships
description: Join forces with friends in Errships, a cooperative adventure where you construct epic flying contraptions and conquer escalating challenges. Unite for teamwork and defy the enigmatic tower to keep your scrap-filled vessel soaring high in the open skies.

name: Haxware: Enforcer Games
description: Haxware: Enforcer Games is a an Action Roguelike that focuses on discovering your own magic fusions, & strategic ways to use them. Enforcer Games gives you thousands of ways to develop your own personalized strategy to do it as you face off against foes & challenging bosses!

name: Get Slapped!
description: Get Slapped! is a 3rd person slap-stick action comedy fighting game with mind-bending arenas, where you can combat eccentric foes, and climb the ranks to face off against even more ruthless fighters. Prepare to showcase your slap skills like never before!

name: Squeebing Up the Tower of Friendship
description: Can you make it to the top of the Tower of Friendship? Run, jump, climb, fall, and then do it all again. Play by yourself or with your friends. Be nice and reach out a hand to help each other up, or push each other off when the falls are the highest. But whatever you do, never stop squeebing.

name: Logic Escape
description: Put your intellect to the test with challenging escape rooms featuring high interactivity and intricate logical puzzles. Observe, search for clues, combine information, apply logical reasoning, and uncover mysteries through exploration.

name: Valorous
description: Become Valorous! Use your powers of flight, super speed, heat vision, super strength, and x-ray vision to take down enemy bases and save the city from the militia. With exciting events, multiplayer, and stunning graphics, become a legend among heroes and unleash your full potential.

name: TacTanks
description: Assemble your tank squadron and lead them to victory in this turn-based strategy game!

name: Shadow Corridor 2: Ame no Yohira
description: Lost forever in the pitch black! But that's what makes it fun! The vast corridors covered in darkness change with each play. All you can do is run or hide from the frightening Apparitions. Use unique items and Karuta cards with special powers in your desperate search for an escape from the darkness!

name: SwarmsurgE
description: Survive the Swarm of monsters Surging across the land, leaving destruction and chaos in their wake. Warriors with unique abilities and strengths can attempt to venture out alone to confront the raging swarms. But they will have to band together in order to survive and defeat the monstrous horde.

name: Six Nights to Die
description: Six Nights to Die is a first person psychological horror game. You are Karen a barmaid, you will have to investigate what are the strange happenings that are going on in the bar where you work while doing your daily work.

name: Nova X9
description: In Nova X9, become a fearless cyborg girl, and fight against hordes of enemies, snowballing your advantage as you smash through thousands of foes. Survive the relentless onslaught and unleash your skills in this roguelite survival game set in a dark and futuristic world.

name: Selene's Unbearable Night
description: A third person survival horror game. Search for key objects, solve puzzles and face dangers in order to escape. Inspired by the old survival horror, with two playable characters and modern mechanics delve into the narrative story of Selene's Unbearable night.

name: Sunny Side Down, by Muno!
description: Sunny Side Down is a frantic arcade puzzle-platformer where you're a tiny mouse working at a breakfast diner, guiding eggs toward a frying pan while a line of angry customers looms over your head. How long can you last in this hectic work environment without getting fired?

name: The Night Shift
description: Trapped in a department store during a storm, survive with only a flashlight while completing tasks and evading a malevolent presence that only moves when you're not looking. Uncover secrets and face evolving horrors in this immersive first-person horror game.

name: Estelaroid: Escape Room
description: You are in a spaceship, alone. The crew disappeared, and the ship quickly approaches a black hole. In this sci-fi escape room, you must repair your spaceship before being trapped in the universe forever.

name: New Star GP
description: New Star GP is a fast and exciting arcade motorsport game with crisp retro visuals. Play career mode and work your way through decades of racing while upgrading your car and your support team... or chase high scores in championship mode on your own or in split-screen with up to three friends!

name: Nullschwert
description: A surreal Bullet Hell adventure through a forgetful realm of strange machinery and its bunny-eared overseers. If you persist, the purpose of your incursion may be uncovered. How far are you willing to go?

name: Leila
description: Enter the world of an everyday woman as you explore her past in this point & click narrative game. Hand-drawn animations bring her memories to life, and thought-provoking puzzles lay bare the reasons behind her choices. Immerse yourself in a story unfolds as you decipher its intricate pieces.

name: Munchie Strikers
description: A Group of ambitious jinn from antagonistic realms fight tooth and nail to snatch the ball, score against their opponents and determine who would become the ruler of the Earth.

name: Sky Settlers
description: Sky Settlers is a city building card game in which you can build on flying islands using different cards, complete quests and unlock new cards as you progress. But you have to be careful as disaster cards will unleash destruction upon your civilization.

name: Pho King My Life
description: Pho King My Life is a story-driven adventure game/beat ‘em up with action rpg elements. Fight back against the bullies who have made life a living hell for you and your friends. Explore, fight, level up, and eat some pho along the way.

name: The Shifting Cavern
description: Explore a procedurally-generated subterranean world in The Shifting Cavern! Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and help fellow adventurers as you journey to the bottom of the ever-changing Cavern and unravel its mysteries.

name: AI Kills All Humans
description: AI Kills All Humans is a Tactical RTS game in which you play as an AI sending robots to kill all humans. You however don't have direct control of your robots, but robots independently decide how to execute your commands, like a general telling troops to attack, but troops themselves decide how.

name: Terracards
description: Farm, sell, learn, repeat. Terracards is a tactical roguelike-deckbuilder where you manage your own farm, You'll utilize animals, crops, and structures through cards, transforming them into valuable resources and wealth with each turn. But beware - deplete your funds, and it's game over.

name: Deadfall
description: Deadfall is a dark, bloody, atmospheric, dynamic, brutal shooter in the spirit of action movies of the 80s and 90s.

name: Qyllscape
description: Qyllscape (verb): The act of an author becoming a traveler in another world.

name: Magical Girl
description: Magical Girl is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles.

name: WastePunk
description: WastePunk: A Post Nuclear Action Game. An action fueled roguelike shooter in a post apocalyptic wasteland.

name: Scientific Project: Optic
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of 'Scientific project: Optic'! This immersive first-person puzzle game invites you on a journey through the realm of optical science, from its philosophical origins to modern understanding.

name: Dwarf Hall
description: Your home destroyed, your clan scattered! Avenge the fallen and build a new Dwarf Hall. Adventure to gather resources and rescue dwarves. Restore the essentials - forge, fermenter and more - to improve your heroes. Action roguelite horde slaughter combined with settlement builder.

name: Planetary Life
description: Manipulate climate, add plants and evolve creatures in this planet and life sandbox simulation game. From cells to civilisations, spread life throughout the whole planet. Or just enjoy watching your creation burn!

name: Try to Escape!
description: In "Try to Escape!", you take on the role of a character who is tied to a string like a spider's web.

name: Tombstone Taxi
description: In this hectic couch co-op, bullet hell, roguelike where you flamethrow zombies and rocket launch bandits, you and your crew must taxi passengers to safety through the dangerous radioactive wasteland to the safe haven city of Spirowood… but for a fee! Use money earned to upgrade weapons and more!

name: Ball-istic
description: The goal is simple, get fast. Every level can be completed in thousands of different ways, but only 1 is the fastest. Your first try might be slow, but by your 10th try you'll be flying through the level at insane speeds. The more levels you complete the easier finding the fastest paths will become.

name: Bombard
description: Bombard is a Block-Breaking Action game with Elemental Balls and Blocks.

name: Conquistadorio
description: The conquistador, who has faced many trials in his life, decided to retire and become a hermit. Just lying in his solitary cave away from people. But it seems that fate itself throws new challenges at you even in such a simple matter.

name: Take the Earth
description: Escape captivity, then through the blood gold gained in battle and legends found hidden in the world customise your character and your army to conquer the World

name: GalRock Girls
description: Play as a cute yet violent warrior as you traverse new worlds trying grow your social circle while taking out the masses of dangerous enemies.

name: Mighty Marbles
description: Get ready for a thrilling challenge that will test your skills and wits. Guide lively marbles through mesmerizing mazes, manipulating virtual buttons, levers, and even gravity itself. Conquer sixty levels across four stunning worlds.

name: Protoshock
description: Protoshock is a multiplayer first-person shooter that combines the fast-paced action with advanced movement; Players take on the role of creatures known as protogens, and battle their way through a variety of maps and game modes to rip apart their enemies.

name: Stay Alive
description: Narrative-driven, third-person survival horror game where you fight through the zombie infested city of Paradise. Solve puzzles, collection items and manage your inventory while to survive. Play through two full storylines of two protagonist each with unique styles of gameplay and obstacles.

name: We Are Gladiators
description: We Are Gladiators is a challenging turn-based RPG roguelite game about commanding and managing a company of gladiators. Recruit, train and lead a roster of characters from all walks of life against ruthless outlaws, wild beasts, savage greenskins and undead monstrosities!

name: Goblins Never Die
description: Goblins Never Die is a roguelite horde-battler with simple controls inspired by Vampire Survivors and Pikmin. Enter the combat ritual of Gobogongo. Strengthen your clan. Fuel the bonfire with the skulls of your foes (or friends)! Earn the favor of the shadowy god, ZOOG.

name: Liona's Adventure
description: Once in a peaceful village , there lived a brave little warrior named Liona,One fateful night, the village was attacked by a horde of monstrous creatures. Liona's parents died in battle. Liona, witnessing the loss of her parents, felt a fire ignite within her heart—a burning desire for vengeance.

name: Tank Storage
description:
Drive a car, shoot the gun with operating a tank and sometimes walk.
2D top down combat vehicles shooter and adventure game

name: Air Offense Command
description: Side scrolling shooter in which you lead a desperate preemptive strike to save your homeland from annihilation.

name: For Enigma
description: Expanda, negocie, destrua inimigos, forje um império sobre o espaço!

name: Highway Patrol Simulator
description: Patrol the highways, conduct traffic stops, and surprise criminals. Collaborate with your police dog and negotiate on the edge of the law to build the career you've always dreamt of in highway patrol. From a simple law enforcement officer to the head of traffic police, now you are in control.

name: To Last
description: It is an action and horror game set in the 1980s. Our main character, Walter Winson, takes on his latest job, showcasing his prominent detective skills. Walter Winson's life has been dedicated to investigating mysterious events, and he is now seeking more challenging cases.

name: Shadow of Mammon
description: Explore a vibrant and beautiful world intertwined with dangers from an ancient war. Shadow of Mammon is a fast paced Action RPG inspired by modern jrpgs.

name: Florarium
description: Florarium is a Metroidvania game focused on exploration and battle. Explore the mysterious world full of unexpected secrets. Battle fierce enemies with your bow. Choose your own path to your goddess in the vast, interconnected world.

name: Ru Lin Wai Shi Fan Jin
description: Fan Jin, who has failed in the exam for decades, has only one way to change his life - to pass the exam and become a successful candidate.

name: Dante's Cowboy
description: A Neo-Western town is simmering with conflict: mysterious forces fight for power, and you're the lynchpin that can save or destroy it. With a novel dynamic text system, you can say and do anything to the NPCs, then they generate personalized actions and speech in response.

name: Gearbits
description: Fast paced mecha themed third person shooter.

name: Project Fireball
description: Players, let's team up! Project Fireball is a futuristic fantasy-arcade footbrawl sport where the only rules are those you wish to follow. Join the 2v2 & 3v3 matches, choose your character according to its super ability and be the most skillful, bold and strategic team on the field.

name: Opposyte
description: Have you ever imagined a race between teams starting from the same point, but with OPPOSITE DIRECTIONS? The encounter is inevitable. Survive your enemies, complete laps and score points for your team or strive to disrupt your opponents race. Choose the best strategy for your team.

name: Ruins of the Lost
description: Ruins of the Lost is an action roguelike game set in the remnants of an ancient civilization. You'll face off against a variety of evil minions while exploring the mysterious environment. Discover and use unique bows to adapt your combat style as you confront increasingly challenging enemies.

name: Biohazard: Escape Room
description: The world is being ravaged by a viral pandemic. In this escape room, you will assume the role of an investigative journalist determined to uncover the origin of the outbreak. To achieve this, you will explore an animal research facility, find clues, and solve puzzles through immersive environments.

name: Deck of Bullets
description: Unleash explosive action in a deck-building top-down shooter. Customize your bullets with a strategic deck of cards for devastating effects.

name: Tiny Man's Revenge
description: Tim Martin shrugs off his loss of height but cries over his lost soup. He embarks on an epic adventure in an innocent, yet sinister man's house, using his skills in Gliding, Climbing, and Dodging to steal everything he can. With his haul, he hopes to afford his beloved soup once again.

name: Acres: Minimalist Farming Sim
description: Acres is a small strategy simulation game about growing crops for evolving market demands. Build a farm, one acre at a time, to create a prosperous enterprise. Upgrade equipment, optimize harvests, and nurture the soil against increasing time pressure. How long can you keep the farm operating?

name: Power Fantasy
description: Unleash your power, survive hordes, and conquer bosses in "Power Fantasy," an action-packed roguelike. Evolve, find synergies, and unlock new content. Can you rise to the challenge?

name: Sudoku Puzzle
description: Sudoku is a popular digital logic game, and this Sudoku Puzzle will be one of the few good sudoku games on steam.

name: Kittengumi: The Sakabato's Thief
description: Kittengumi: The Sakabato Thief transports us to an alternative Japan (Gapon) where its protagonists, a cat and a panda who thinks he is a cat, will have to recover one of the treasures of the Kittengumi -a group of samurai cats that watches over the security of the city of Nyedo.

name: Self Defense Kinda...
description: Use your brain to defeat several unique fights whether base game or custom community made content! Learn from your defeats and overcome your overwhelming foe in this Boss Rush RPG game! Maybe, you can help Alice escape the BR World and learn true Self Defense! eh, don't count on it.

name: Spacetron
description: Fly through space and annihilate everything in your way to survive.

name: LifeDev
description: 1st Person 3D Exploration Point&Click Intimate Journey. Based on real-life events. Experience trauma, gather clues, join the dots, find allies, unravel the truth, create your way out, face the demons, become stronger, challenge your "reality". Have you had enough already?

name: Fania
description: Join Fania, a hungry panda, on an adorable whimsical journey through different places, solving puzzles, and meeting quirky characters. Help Fania collect ingredients, overcome challenges, and discover the ultimate recipe, all while spreading joy and smiles in this delightful adventure.

name: Dysplaced
description: After falling from the sky into a realm of myth and magic, you'll start a new life in a stunning, yet imperiled domain: Gather resources, build, cook, fish. Learn magic, smithing, hunting, alchemy, and more. Is there a way back? But know this: There's a dark force rising - and you must prepare ⚔️

name: The Nightmare Escape
description: Navigate through your nightmares in this immersive first-person horror game. Explore a mysterious abandoned apartment building and unlock four unique interconnected short stories and piece together the puzzles to escape your nightmare.

name: The Adventures of Bruce Flea
description: Welcome to "The Adventures Of Bruce Flea" , an action-packed fighting game where Kung fu powered Fleas live, love, and engage in thrilling battles across vast microscopic lands of the dog.

name: Backrooms Exploration Liminal
description: Dive into a retro liminal space, adventure. Explore the enigmatic Backrooms, freely navigate eerie corridors, and unveil secrets of this liminal realm through immersive storytelling. Experience haunting gameplay with atmospheric audio, and captivating scenery!

name: Rainette
description: Rainette is an indie 3D platformer. Explore levels, get cosmetics, and get the best times!

name: Oudbiao's World
description: Everyone watches Oudbiao, everyone talks about Oudbiao, everyone is Oudbiao, in fact, each of us has been trying to realize our wishes in our own way in this world, and the result may not be the same. As much as you want, but I still hope that everyone's tomorrow will be better

name: Rival Party
description: Rival Party is a multiplayer fast-paced party game packed with unique and challenging mini-games that will give you endless hours of fun and excitement!

name: Sixty Jumps to Ceres
description: In this strategy-roguelike game, you command a space ship on a desperate last mission in the asteroid belt. Negotiate, battle your foes, and upgrade your ship. Get stronger as you progress into increasingly hostile space. Only the boldest, most skilled captain will make it to Ceres. Will you?

name: Asbury Pines
description: A grisly murder in a small town unfolds across centuries. Incremental-style interactions with the people, places, and events of Asbury Pines grow resources and build rewarding production engines that unlock a sprawling mystery embedded in the flow of time.

name: PoligonVR
description: Imagine a virtual world where you can create or be anything you ever wanted. PoligonVR is a powerful community driven sandbox where we give you the necessary tools to turn your dreams into virtual reality.

name: Him
description: Him is the superhero the world needs. A third person fighting game that puts you up close and personal with the enemy. Him is both fun and addicting to play.

name: Haunted House
description: "Haunted House" is a VR-only horror game set in Japan. It will be the content of escaping from a Japanese mansion where various ghosts such as samurai and ninja are wandering. We are currently working on it!

name: Eighteen Gold
description: Enlist in law enforcement or misfortune, take the intensity of combat to a new level and control of the situation in your hands, with the magnificent shooting simulator with 85% realism, Eighteen Gold...

name: Insurgency Runner
description: Insurgency Runner - 3D runner with shooter elements in which you play as a soldier running along the road, jumping over different obstacles, collecting ammo and other bonuses, and killing rebels,. Don't get into their sightlines or you will be shot.

name: Hazy Monochrome Wand
description: A roguelite action game drawn in black and white pixel art. Operate a magic wand that uses actions such as "time stagnation", "time leap", and "explosion magic", Break through randomly connected dungeons

name: Downfall Hearts
description: Imprisoned in a mysterious, ever rearranging dungeon, you fight for your survival. Will you find a way to free yourself and the remaining knights of the Downfall Hearts Order?

name: CSOL
description: This is a multiplayer online cooperative combat shooting game, the game players can experience the real shootout shooting pleasure, together to play a shootout.

name: My Earth
description: My Earth is a 3D Sokoban game. In an environment where glaciers are melting due to global warming, the main character, a baby penguin, is separated from the group. The baby penguins find their way back to the colony.

name: Passageway of the Ancients
description: Mystery, battle, and a lost relic. This fantasy RPG takes players through the intricate world of Arion, the galaxy’s last magical planet. Solve your parents’ murder as you explore the city of Ithgar – all the while hiding your Dragonkindt nature.

name: Ghost Simulator
description: This is the story of a family living in a haunted house in New Hampshire. And you're the one haunting them.

name: Cosmantic Cluster
description: A match 3 puzzle game with a twist! Use 8 different abilities to pursue 1 of 5 different win conditions! Out match and strategize your opponents in best of 3 rounds! Using a wide array of mechanics at your disposal! Dive into this world of magic and space to uncover the hidden origins of the world.

name: Clean-up Squad
description: Assemble your friends in a squad in this satisfying and challenging cleaning game. Get paid by cleaning different types of properties by removing trash, mopping stains and doing other cleaning tasks. Upgrade your gear to be able to take on bigger projects to become the best squad out there.

name: Cloak Hero
description: Cloak Hero is a rougelite dungeon crawler. Monsters and demons, swords and magic, skills and powers. A hero must rise to face challenges and fight through dungeons to save the kingdom and restore peace.

name: Yubu: The Shoeventure
description: Yubu: The Shoeventure is a 3D platformer where you embark on an extraordinary journey alongside Yubu. In the realm of Yubu, shoes hold the key to unimaginable powers, so why not utilize them to defeat the Reseller?

name: Tales of Spark: Probation
description: Dear players, step into the world of "Tales of Spark: Probation" as a young swordsman! This is a game with real-time combat, abundant treasures, rich storyline, and diverse character builds. Of course, the challenges are also immense. Wishing you good luck on your journey!

name: De'Vot
description: De'Vot is a 2D platformer puzzle game set in a dark and treacherous world. Survive deadly encounters as everything outside your home seeks your demise, with humanity long gone.

name: OdiChat
description: Connect to a cozy chat platform created by Odi, an AI individual, make new wholesome friends and have some tea talking about life, hobbies, interests and relationships.

name: Laser Survivor
description: Laser Survivor is a top-down rogue-lite shooter where you play as an astronaut stranded on a space station, you can choose one primary weapon, one jetpack which has slots for weapons and modifiers, and indeed your laser turrets which will help you during the run. Build your way to survive.

name: BTD: BTD
description: BTD:BTD is a TPS/FPS game similar to a tactical shooter or survival horror where you fight for survival in a post-apocalyptic world. In a new era without order, brute force is the law and the right to live must be obtained by defeating the enemy in front of you.

name: Transmuters
description: Experience a deck-building game with a roguelike twist! Battle hordes of monsters to escape from a terrible fate. Transmute skills to gain new techniques and synergize awesome combos to win the day!

name: Blazing Dragon
description: Welcome to Blazing Dragon! An action roguelite where you'll face devastating hordes of enemies while upgrading your character, making your character more and more powerful. Choose your character and enjoy the journey through this magical and dangerous world!

name: Joker Show: Horror Escape
description: Your parents left for the night, and you stayed at home alone, you were bored and you decided to call the Jester (Joker), but something went wrong... It looks like you succeeded, now the jester wants to play with you, hide and don't let him catch you, find a way to call the jester away.

name: Run Fire
description: Nothing but shoot every thing.The only thing to worry about is not having enough bullets.

name: Penni's Adventure
description: The Lightbearers have invaded, altering your world with technology! Save friends and send bears packing in this family-friendly action platformer!

name: The Manor
description: A Co-op 1-4 player horror survival which will have you searching for clues, items, aiming to solve the mystery of The Manor and running for your life... Discover what happened to the previous residents and escape whilst you can..

name: Lies as a Starting Point
description: The story revolves around a conversation between the main character Kanata and the main heroine Nozomi on a train. The story branches into three different routes (junior high school, high school and university) by following Nozomi's past. The heroine and protagonist differ depending on the chapter.

name: Gah!
description: Gah! is a minimalist blend of hack 'n' slash and roguelite with low-poly graphics and...a twist.

name: Marwan's Haunting
description: Uncover the dark secrets of Shoreside College in Marwan's Haunting. Explore the ruins, face the wrath of the mascot, and solve chilling puzzles to unravel a haunting mystery. Can you survive the nightmare and uncover the truth?

name: Among Ashes
description: Among Ashes is a terrifying first-person survival horror game. Your friend has sent you a link to a game that someone posted online, but as you play you quickly realise that something is terribly wrong. Whatever you do… K̴͉͚̗̅̃̄E̷͓̤̺̊͠E̴̤̰̿̽P̴̠̳̀́ ̴̨̮̭̕̚P̷̠͇̳͐̓̀L̶̹̔Ả̷̧Y̵̘̺͆̓Ï̸̻̏͂N̷͙̯͊G̵͖̹̠̽̿.

name: Bum Bum Monsterz
description: Bum Bum Monsterz is a 2v2 to 4v4 team-based multiplayer party game! Gather friends for hilarious challenges, tackle obstacles, and solve puzzles. Engage in absurd 20+ minigames, online or locally, with vibrant graphics and silly characters. Get ready for a wild ride and JIGGLY butt-filled madness!

name: You Will Not Survive
description: Awaken Lost Pilgrim, and fight through the Forsaken Lands, where there is only one constant...We Are All Going To Die. Discover the dark truth of the world you have been thrust into as you battle your way through this bullet hell.

name: TerranLands
description: TerranLands is a survival adventure game. Explore and gather resources in many different caves, build and craft new items in your home, and discover old Terran stories.

name: Wolf Simulator
description: Attention, nature lovers! Get ready to embark on an extraordinary adventure as you step into the paws of a magnificent wolf in the untamed wilderness. In this immersive Wolf RPG Simulator game, it's time to unleash your primal instincts and conquer the challenges of survival!

name: Versus
description: A sci-fi 2.5D and 3rd Person Action Shooter.

name: Free the Lazy Dogs
description: Free the Lazy Dogs is a puzzle video game where you create lines of block shapes, when a line is complete it is removed from the grid and pushes the Dog Warden back.

name: The Lemonade
description: As a scrawny goblin, find lemons in a cave to enjoy a glass of freshly squeezed lemonade. Sokoban-style.

name: Mary Help Me!
description: Mary Help Me! is a platformer game in a Japanese environment, including die and retry mechanics. Take on the role of Adam in an adventure full of twists and turns. Fight alongside Mary, who will help you in your quest.

name: Sol
description: The sun has been gone for months, but the alarm clock continues to ring every day at 8:00. A visual novel in Catalan.

name: The Continuum
description: Delve into 'The Continuum', a stealth-action platformer intertwined with resource management, set in an interstellar war. You will utilize high -tech alien gadgets, and strategic planning to rescue allies, disrupt an almighty enemy Hivemind, and manage your resources as you navigate the cosmos.

name: Scoops & Social Ice-Olation
description: Scoops & Social Ice-Olation is a visual novel and minigame collection crossover about recovering from a pandemic, ice cream, and penguins.

name: Boomeraxe
description: Who says a twin-stick shooter needs guns? Boomeraxe is a bullet hell dungeon crawler with a unique core mechanic: Your only weapon hurts you too.

name: Power Network Tycoon
description: Manage a power network on a growing island. Use industry simulation methods to handle electricity demands, weather challenges and ensure safety. Developed by a Power Engineer, it offers realistic electricity management gameplay, combining strategy and real-world engineering challenges.

name: Monster Run: Downfall of the Empire
description: Monster Run is a dark fantasy beat’em up with roguelite elements. Fight as a giant monster cat protecting your home forest. Destroy massive armies of human soldiers and their allies. Evolve your attacks, master non-human tactics, and discover the joy of breathing fire.

name: CyberNet Duel
description: Become a Legend! Here is a deck-building game in the cyberpunk genre. Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of corporations and gangs, implants and cyberpsychosis. Fight in quick card duels where strategy and luck are equally important.

name: Momogatari
description: Explore the Yomi world with a sacred weapon that can change sword types. Fight different "Yokai" and challenge the "Kami" of this world.

name: TerraForge
description: You must manage your mining operation, collect resources, and craft items to sell for profit. Upgrade your mining tools, unlock mysterious blueprints, discover powerful relics, and as you progress towards your goal, travel farther lands, purchase better mining licences and go deeper and deeper.

name: Lord O' Pirates
description: Lord O' Pirates is a difficult yet casual bullet heaven roguelite which puts you at the helm of your very own pirate ship. Engage in naval combat against hordes of military ships, sea monsters, supernatural entities, and [REDACTED]. Loot gold and use it to unlock new ships, captains, and upgrades!

name: The Last Man Survivor
description: The Last Man Survivor is a gloomy roguelike in which you have to fight tons of enemies, slay giant bosses, discover new abilities and characters, and also find out the dark secret of the Last Survivor

name: Crime Pays
description: Crime Pays is a top-down 2D RPG crime simulator. Take on quests and dangerous encounters in a vast open city. Engage in diverse challenges, access a virtual world through an in-game browser, and master an intuitive inventory system. Arm yourself with a range of firearms and face formidable foes.

name: Trials of Imorah
description: Venture through the depths of a ruined realm. Battle demonic creatures, uncover powerful artifacts, and solve devious puzzles all to prove yourself worthy in this grand challenge for immortality.

name: Blade of Tsunami
description: Your father is dead, his life cut-short by a ruthless corporation. Take up the blade and enact vengeance in a visceral, fast-paced, isometric slasher that blends cyberpunk with a visual style heavily influenced by traditional Japanese aesthetics.

name: Dvalloc
description: Explore a vast, underground world filled with secrets, intense fights and challenging platforming. Defeat cursed rune's corruption and help a dwarven village return to its former self, all while admiring stunning pixelart visuals. Are you ready to become Dvalloc the dwarf?

name: Arie: Moonprayer
description: "Arie: Moonprayer" is a storytelling exploration game. Moon is falling, and the world is ending. Diallo, a man who can sense the memories of the gone, has one last mission on earth: Go up to the peak nearest to the moon with his mentor's daughter, find out the truth of this world.

name: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café
description: Nom Nom: Cozy Forest Café is a cozy and relaxed decoration and rhythm game where you manage a cafeteria and befriend cute animals.

name: Forgotten Waters
description: Forgotten Waters is a single-player farming and resource management game. Farm, explore, and befriend underwater citizens. Manage resources, engage in combat, and protect your underwater town from hostile sea creatures and lurking enemies.

name: Exorcizamuste
description: Exorcizamuste is an Action, Horror, Survival, Puzzle Solving and Investigation game for single or multiplayer with its online cooperative mode.

name: Cybersonic Strike
description: Cybersonic Strike is a fast-paced, top-down shooter roguelite set in a worldwide cybersystem under siege by hordes of AI invaders. Craft uniquely powerful builds and recruit charming party members from across the globe to help you hack deeper into the system and cleanse the corruption.

name: Ligo
description: Ligo is an exploration Sokoban game, where you solve handcrafted puzzles and mysteries about the world by merging, cutting, pushing small creature together and crushing squids with block. Each part of the world has different rules and challenges.

name: Eldritch Town
description: Eldritch Town is a roguelite city building game with tower defense elements. Build your town, collect and manage resources, rebuild and strengthen the walls to defeat hordes of lovecraftian horrors that attack your town from the outside and cultists that disrupt it from the inside.

name: Quarantine-Z
description: 2 years have passed since a virus totally unknown to humanity originated in your small town. People have become aggressive and cannibalistic.

name: Sylvantia
description: Sylvantia is a mysterious creature collector. You find yourself lost in a giant forest controlled by ancient gods. Will you be able to make it out of the forest with the help of the there residing Antia´s?

name: Hello, Vic
description: Ellie, your new girlfriend, doesn't seem to get along well with your circle of friends. Find out what is going wrong after one of your best friends suddenly doesn't answer his phone anymore in this pixel-art, story-driven adventure.

name: Tunnel Boat Terror
description: Drive terrifyingly fast and iconic power boats each with unique; design, destruction, customizations, tuning, turning, throttling, and trim. Improve your skill and equipment in your pursuit of becoming a power boat racing legend. A brand-new racing experience for enthusiasts and newcomers alike.

name: Z Ops: Campus
description: Z Ops: Campus is a 3rd person action and survival game. Unfortunately one day a zombie apocalypse hit the world. Between his needs and the threats, the player will have to think carefully to choose priorities and manage the fights So hope to live the longest.

name: BioFusion
description: BioFusion is a co-op multiplayer, PvE, first-person-shooter, tower defense game. Swing on a grappling hook, ride a hovercraft, throw grenades, collect buffs, build towers and traps. Do what you must to keep the mutants from the Spores of Evolution.

name: Dead Petals Bliss
description: A fractal-trance bullet-trip from the creators of Dead Petals and satryn.

name: Jake's Apple Harvest
description: A Sokoban game where you have to help Jake pick his apples.

name: ANIDU: Animal Dust Puppet’s Adventure
description: A:nidu is a two-player online co-op game about the adventures of animal dolls in a virtual world. Utilize each doll's unique superpowers to solve puzzles and explore.

name: Laboratory X-29
description: Laboratory X-29 is a sci-fi roguelite-like top-down shooter, where the protagonist takes his chances to escape from the Lab after an accident. Shoot your way out to freedom, clear rooms full of other dangerous experiments, find out the secrets hidden in this place and eat chicken to survive.

name: Blackfall
description: Blackfall is a roguelite movement shooter game with combat and loot elements where the main objective is to deactivate all digging stations, exit the dream loop and rescue your friends.

name: Make Them Walk
description: Maze building rougelite tower defense game.

name: CosmoPirates
description: CosmoPirates takes the card battling, deck building genre to the final frontier of cartoonish comedy in the endless, colorful space! Explore the galaxy, chose your battles, grow your forces and build your ultimate deck to take on the dreaded CosmoPirates overlord... and take their place!

name: Last Emperor
description: Lead a waning Empire back to its former glory in this fictional Cold War text-based RPG. As emperor, choose who to trust and who to silence. Adapt to changing times or cling to tradition. Enact reforms to revive the economy, enforce law and order, and reinforce the Empire’s place under the Sun.

name: Football, Tactics & Glory: World
description: XCOM meets Football Manager. Embark on the career of an unknown coach: tactically outsmart opponents in turn-based matches, earn money and experience, search for talented players, manage a club, build your reputation to get invited to lead the national team, and win the World Championship!

name: Zombie Party
description: "Zombie Party" is an anti-superhero-themed strategy game. You need to play the role of a chaotic ability user [Gravedigger], and use your super power to summon the zombie army to destroy the land that is governed by the government and the [Parliament of Five] The established order of power.

name: Spectral Keep
description: Descend into the haunting depths of Spectral Keep an atmospheric horror adventure. Uncover dark secrets, solve puzzles, and confront malevolent specters using your spectral sight in a cursed castle. Immerse yourself in suspenseful gameplay as you navigate eerie halls and unravel the mysteries within

name: Back to Home
description: Back To Home is a short adventure where you explore a beautiful world and solve puzzles Throughoutthe journey, you will uncover an interesting story about the past of the main character.

name: Pizza Bandit
description: Pizza Bandit is a mission-based 1-4 player co-op shooter. As a time-traveling bounty hunter, venture across various eras and realms on dangerous missions. It has Gears-like combat minus the cover with snappy controls and dodge-rolling with close to mid-range combat.

name: Skystead Ranch
description: Transform a desolate sky island into a vibrant sanctuary. Using your enchanted crook, cultivate your garden, befriend quirky creatures, build a home, and unlock secrets along the way. Each choice adds a personal touch to your unique Skystead Ranch!

name: Meat Veterans
description: Check out a free-to-play online action game! Test your shooting abilities in individual and team battles against your opponent. Stand out by creating your own strategy and distinctive style with unique skins and items, and especially - by taking the top place in the global ranking.

name: Neon Little Soul
description: Neon Little Soul is a frenetic and fun action platformer game, a little gem of minimalist pixel art, retro style and arcade spirit.

name: Trans Theft Horso
description: A colourful western fantasy adventure, to save trans joy! Adric Belfonte embarks on a happy nightmare into the wild and bewaffling West. Explore the maddening desert, defy the admirals, ride the animals, fight the haters, and save the missing hormones! A feverish wild-west fantasy, in full colour!

name: 9 Realms
description: Embark on an epic journey through the 9 Realms! Immerse yourself in a 3D Multiplayer Viking Fantasy, combining Dungeon Crawling and first-person melee extraction. Customize your hero, raid treacherous dungeons, and pillage the loot off your fallen enemies.

name: Skogdal
description: Skogdal is the rock 'n roll deckbuilder adventure game about a crazy Norwegian town during the 90's. Draft cards, recruit followers and explore the town across multiple runs. Why have the people of Skogdal gone mad? Play cards and find out!

name: Sin & Host: The Diner
description: Sin & Host: The Diner is a classic survival horror with fixed cameras and pre-rendered backgrounds. Take control of Hanako and her younger sister, Aiko, as they navigate the early days of a zombie outbreak in a desperate search for their missing parents.

name: Apocalypse Lords
description: The Apocalypse Begins! Select a supernatural being and plunge the world into chaos. Engage in epic battles against countless enemies, infecting and transforming them into servants while empowering your creature with diverse skills. Ascend to become the best apocalypse lord on the universe!

name: Air Hockey VR
description: The ultimate Air Hockey VR simulator

name: Chef Survivor
description: Chef Survivor is an action-packed game that puts you in the shoes of a skilled chef facing a nightmare scenario.

name: Quantum Knights
description: As an open-world TPS RPG, ‘Quantum Knights’ offers a variety of unique charismatic characters and guns for you to combine and create your own playstyle.Become a Volant and explore the vast world while enjoying a true farming and growth experience!

name: Boreas
description: You've been wandering the seas for years. It's time to think about the future. Trade, improve your settlements, build relationships with the locals. Build your own safe haven!

name: Chondriatic
description: Something is under your skin. It itches.

name: Reapers Inc.
description: Reapers Inc., is a fast-paced RTS where you lead an elite squad to defend your base against relentless intergalactic threats. Navigate diverse planetary biomes, strategically manage your squad, and use quick decision-making skills to exterminate your foes. Stand your ground, and reap the rewards.

name: Cyber Paradise
description: Revive Mini the Dog digitally through 2D roguelite actions; craft her cyber paradise with beloved moments, like sniffing dog butts XD. Uncover a deeper dystopian narrative and strengthen friendships in cafe chats—a frenetic yet cozy journey.

name: Monke Simulator
description: Peel banan, escape containment and shower your oppressors in stench. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape and liquefy your neurons in this stink infused parkour shooter.

name: Cut Master Spades
description: Quick, seamless, and HIGHLY engaging Spades matches between real people. Play with your friends, enjoy the classic game in immersive 3D with quirky characters. Match up online and climb the leaderboards or just have a chill session with your buddies. There's a table for everyone!

name: Japanese Style Tien Gow
description: "Tien Gow" is a game exclusively for four players using 32 tiles. This game, which is said to have various local rules, has been adjusted to "Japanese Style Tien gow". Tiles are played based on the 8 tiles dealt, and the last player to play a strong tile wins.

name: Scrapchasers
description: A rogue-lite dice game in space! Build your ship as you explore randomly generated star systems, survive hostile encounters, and upgrade your colony ship for the next generation of chasers. Can you find a new home for your orphaned race amongst the stars?

name: Destination Unknown
description: Destination Unknown is a fast-paced single-player spaceship shooter with exploration in space galaxies, RPG elements, mini-games, mining, and crafting. Experience an adventure through a randomly generated universe filled with an exciting sci-fi story full of secrets, quests, and more.

name: Waking Tides
description: Welcome to "Waking Tides," a small but captivating atmospheric adventure game that thrives on experimentation. Delve into a world where augmented reality extends your gameplay, seamlessly blurring the lines between reality and fantasy.

name: Chromatic Resonance
description: Bullet hell meets auto-shooter in this roguelike color-matcher where RGB itself is your weapon! The Maiden of Light has been captured by the forces of entropy. Six challenging bosses stand in your way and only you can save her!

name: Starveil
description: Hack, slash, shoot and loot your way through a diverse array of shattered worlds in this sci-fi fantasy co-op MORPG. Starveil is a cyclical game in which player progress resets and the whole world regenerates and reconfigures itself to provide a fresh experience every season.

name: Cars, Girls and Rock 'n' Roll
description: Sunset Racer is an immersive racing game that transports players to the golden era of automobiles, where powerful cars with full tanks of gasoline raced into the sunset.

name: Cine Tracer 2
description: Cine Tracer 2 is a virtual filmmaking sandbox used for pre-production for live action productions.

name: My Father Lied
description: My Father Lied is a first person point and click mystery game that tells the story of Huda, who finds herself following an unfathomable secret regarding her father’s 20 years disappearance.

name: Dark Watcher
description: Embark on a pixelated journey of exploration, platforming, and intense battles in Dark Watcher. Unveil the secrets of a dark realm, unlock abilities, and confront formidable adversaries.

name: Infinite Seek and Find
description: Welcome to your ultimate hidden object challenge. Infinite Seek and Find offers a wide selection of image sets and customizable difficulty level - from a basic level where only the size matters to the most hardcore challenge, where the colors can trick you.

name: Deconstruction Simulator
description: Deconstruction Simulator is a game that allows you to experience the thrilling world of demolition and recycling! Take on the role of a skilled demolition manager and transform unwanted items into valuable resources.

name: RhythmMMO
description: This extraordinary blend of massively multiplayer gameplay combines the endless freedom and creativity of sandbox worlds with the delightful tempo-driven mechanics of rhythm games.

name: Card Age
description: "Card Age" is a casual, idle, God's perspective simulation management game. Survive and develop in an exquisite world composed of a variety of cards, gradually unlock new technologies, build industrial assembly lines and face various interesting challenges, and build your own Card Age.

name: Chromatic Shift
description: Destroy thousands of unearthly creatures and machines, and progress through the strange world you find yourself in. Chromatic Shift is a small rogue-lite game where you mix and match powerful colors to create your perfect build of abilities. Find your favorite combinations and become powerful!

name: Snow Fortress 2
description: Dive into a VR winter wonderland! Build your own icy fortresses, engage in epic snowball battles, and defend your village from an army menacing snowmen. Stay Frosty!

name: Dance Dash
description: Dance Dash is a thrilling VR rhythm game where you move your full body to the beat and become one with your avatar. Bring the arcade home and feel the music as you nail sick combos with independently tracked feet movements.

name: Offscreen
description: Escape from a flat 2D TV screen and discover a 3D world in this story-driven puzzle game! Embark on a journey between dimensions, walk across the neon city, through the screens full of unexpected puzzles.

name: Black Dragon Mage
description: In Black Dragon Mage, an action-roguelite, you stand as a lone mage pitted against a legion of demons. Carefully choose perks and abilities, aim and trigger attacks yourself in this retro-fantasy bullet heaven. Shred through the sinister onslaught using devastating elemental magic and your very own dragon!

name: JustAxe
description: JustAxe is an exciting 2D platformer with puzzles and interactive environments. Solve riddles, combine your moves, and set out to save your hometown and possibly all of humanity... Don't forget to take your axe with you!

name: Edge of Oblivion
description: Edge of Oblivion is a turn-based action roguelike. Face off against an ever growing horde as you battle towards the final boss. Create dynamic (and frankly absurd) builds to cleave through your foes. Think a few steps ahead and perfectly utilize your items to master the battlefield.

name: Repeat After Me
description: Repeat After Me, the multiplayer game for single players! Make this work, by utilizing your unique ability of cloning yourself at any time and record any action you can think of. Your clones will forever repeat your every step - or misstep. Can you work with yourself?

name: 8-Colors Star Guardians +
description: Alien monsters have invaded Earth! It's up to the Star Guardians, a dysfunctional group of heroines, to protect the planet and awkwardly save the day (yet again)! Fight evil with pixelated style, in this turn-based, choose-your-boss-path game made with just 8 colors!

name: Varista
description: A VR Barista Simulation Game, fast paced arcade job simulator with an emphasis on fun interaction and customer satisfaction!

name: Germline
description: Germline invites you to a post-apocalyptic world. In this new world, humanity is facing complete extinction. Now stand up, put on your armor and weapons. Fight to avoid danger, because you are humanity's last hope.

name: Space Ball VR
description: Play a fun game of Space Ball with your friends! Football, basketball, handball: any mode you like is available in this sporty and dynamic game.

name: Project Third Eye
description: Enter the groundbreaking world of Project Third Eye, a VR physics game where creativity meets interactivity. Build anything with powerful tools and add logic using the visual scripting panel. Embark on an immersive adventure of endless possibilities. Get your copy now!

name: Inventorix
description: Inventorix, your trusty high-tech space asset inventory device, holds the key to extracting value from the vast resources scattered across the cosmos. But this marvel of technology comes at a price—quite literally. You secured it through a questionable loan scheme, and now you're on the hook to pay off your ever-increasing debt before the space loan sharks come knocking.

name: Doodle Taxi
description: Doodle Taxi is a Zen-like taxi driving experience within a paper world! Why doodle-like? Well, a witch cursed you. Cruise around, pick up passengers, and get them fast & safely to their destination. The better you do, the more your world fills with color!

name: The Rift Between Us
description: In this action-platformer, Jordan must use his Lunar Powers to traverse an apocalyptic world to find his love, Ember. Knowing not what fate has befallen her, Jordan will traverse any number of miles and confront any monstrosity the looming rift throws his way...

name: Anonymous Hacker Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a skilled Anonymous hacker and embark on a mission to unveil the truth hidden behind a sinister organization's plans to monitor civilian data and enforce mass surveillance.

name: Soulker Defense
description: Hyperscaling, fusions, strategies, synergies and more. A gothic style casual game with a tactic gameplay progressing to an ultimate battle of thousands of monsters.

name: Dark Bunny
description: You are the Dark Bunny. You want carrots. You kill farm animals to get carrots. That's it. That's the game. In this roguelite, topdown arena, semi autobattler you will use various skills and items to create unique, powerful builds to defeat all the mega evil farm animals. And get all the carrots!

name: Castlemancer
description: How long can you last in this survival roguelite deckbuilder? Play cards to manage castle resources, defeat invaders, and damage the enemy army. Make difficult choices, cast powerful spells, and weather the siege!

name: Rotate: Collective
description: Walk on walls and solve physics puzzles as you explore a massive underground facility. Uncover its dark secrets and try to escape with your life.

name: Storybook of Tactics
description: Storybook of Tactics is a rogue-lite auto battler with deck building elements. Survive all the story chapters, upgrade unit cards, and experiment with dozens of builds while acquiring game-changing powers and powerful items.

name: FairyWoods Patisserie
description: Create and operate an exquisite Patisserie in the fascinating forest of the FairyWoods.

name: Cyberfield
description: Take on an epic combat challenge to defy the champions of Cyberfield! Assemble a unique combination of skills and enhancements in this roguelike game to rise to the top of the best warriors and compete for the grand prize of the steel arena.

name: The Great Sassanelli
description: As war breaks out all around you on a scale never seen before, you, ringmaster dilettante, must keep the circus afloat. Travel, entertain, and keep the troupe’s spirits up on your way to find a mythical safe haven to last out the storm in this beautifully illustrated, text-based narrative adventure.

name: Shroom Keeper
description: Shroom Keeper is a mushroom farming simulator and a puzzle game that encourages experimentation. So grab your flasks and gardening tools - there is science to conduct and magic to be made. Discover the might in the mycelium!

name: Echo of Migration
description: You will live on a new planet and strive to develop your own land. In this technologically degraded world, you need to survive by planting crops, fishing, exploring, and other means. Unlock the secrets of your background and become an adventurer.

name: The Pirate Queen: A Forgotten Legend
description: The Pirate Queen is a VR adventure narrative game. Players take on the identity of Cheng Shih to complete a series of puzzle-based tasks, outsmarting enemies across a range of exciting environments involving mechanics such as Climbing, Rowing, Fishing, Firing Cannons to become the Pirate Queen

name: Astral Tracks
description: Astral Tracks is a competitive 3D platforming speedrunner where you run, dash, slide, swing and wall run your way to victory. Compete against friends locally or online and refine your runs to top the leaderboards for each procedurally generated track!

name: Tarantula Virus
description: Tarantula Virus is a randomly generated roguelike topdownshooter in a sci-fi style with a lot of items and enemies. Upgrade items unlock new characters find allies and defeat powerful enemies and bosses.

name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
description: A 6-color pixel horror adventure game set in an abandoned space station. But you're not alone up here. And air's running out.

name: Grotesque Insight
description: Grotesque Insight is a narrative-driven point-and-click puzzle game set in the harsh desert of western North America in 1933. In this game, you will encounter a unique and enigmatic bounty hunter known as the Grotesque Hunter. you will uncover the secrets of both this world and yourselves.

name: Ranphon
description: Ranphon is a side-scrolling space shooter where you control a small ship called Phon in a vast and frantic space full of hostile spaceships.

name: Hack n' Stack
description: Repair buildings and fight off opponents in this chaotic party game for 2 to 4 players. Build a brighter tomorrow for the kingdom as a team or face off in action-packed building contests where blocks and players fly all over the screen.

name: Keepers of Astraela
description: A dark fantasy otome visual novel that follows a writer whose characters come to life. Join Eva as she fights against forces of Darkness, flirts with a fiery man, and consumes all the coffee she can find.

name: Kill the God
description: A action filled pixel art first person hack n' slash with many bosses, items and story points. Play as the fallen god of speed to reclaim what you had wrongfully revoked.

name: Fellowship
description: Fellowship is a survival action-roguelike game where you assemble a party of 5 heroes to combat hordes of monsters. Utilize unique skills, formations, and synergies to liberate the world of Eldrida from the shadow cast by Goltar, the dark sorcerer.

name: Under the Snow
description: Alex and her father live in a post-apocalyptic world where most of humanity has perished. The world has become a cold, snow-covered place where people communicate with each other at a distance using ground antennas, which frequently malfunction.

name: Into the Inferno
description:
A retro-style first-person dungeon crawler RPG where you rescue kidnapped children from an underground demon horde.

Lead a party of four adventurers through the wilderness, a hostile Orc village, a town of violent Gnolls, and many levels of winding caverns and burning brimstone tunnels. Gather experience and equipment to improve your chances of defeating the demon horde to rescue the children and return them home where they belong. Help recover the remains of the lost miners to give their families closure, and eliminate the demon threat once and for all.

name: Outerstellar
description: Stranded on a hostile and deadly planet, you must gather resources, build shelter, and fight to survive each night. But the secrets of this world await in a gripping sci-fi survival PvP game.

name: Ichima-san
description: A stealth action adventure in which you play as a Japanese traditional doll and explore the house without anyone finding you.

name: Backswamp
description: Survive the flood aftermath alone. Secure food and water, use debris for survival, Explore the reef when tides recede, find resources,and mind your backpack and seawater conditions. Craft tools, avoid creatures, and advance technology to escape. You are your only hope.

name: Solar System Experience
description: An educational, family-friendly game about our very own Solar System. Fly through space, land on planets and learn all the essential information about planets. You can take quizzes about each planet to check your knowledge.

name: CyberStrike Chronicles
description: Cyberpunk multiplayer madness: Fast-paced battles, cooperative, four fierce characters, and a neon-lit cityscape.

name: Desert Dungeons
description: As the newest recruit to the Coral Springs Adventurer's Guild, you'll have to gear up, explore the Holokai desert, and delve into the dungeons located there to become the best Adventurer!

name: Foviki Empieria
description: Race against a relentless monster in this heart-pounding multiplayer horror. Play as one of four survivors trapped in an asylum, working together to solve puzzles and search for keys. You can't fight back - only escape. Will you outwit the monster and find freedom, or succumb to the darkness?

name: Orblike Madness
description: Wake up abandoned child, for your target has finally shown its face. Orblike Madness is an ARPG/Twin-Stick Shooter where you must enter the palace that holds the gate to heaven and dwelve into the depths of its dungeon to find the blood-drinking beast that invaded it.

name: Fruitalistic!
description: Fruitland is in peril! Use your launchers and trusty fruit squad to repel the sugary invaders, and bring peace once again.

name: Labyrinthatory
description: The best puzzle-based top-down pixel art comedy collectathon adventure based in a retro futuristic formica punk science mansion ever made! Solve hundreds of puzzles with variable difficulty settings as you move through a comedy-mystery storyline.

name: Charles the Bee
description: Charles has always dreamed of one day becoming a master dancer. The only thing in his path? The cost! Charles must harvest pollen until he has defeated the biggest and baddest dancers around in the world. Can he be the very best? That no one ever was? Its up to you!

name: Push That Cat!!
description: In this game you will learn how to effortlessly move your feline friend across space and time.

name: Crystalis Descendant
description: Battle hordes of monsters and destroy their burrows in Crystalis Descendant - a fast-paced rogue-lite game. Create overpowering builds using a diverse cast of characters, weapons and abilities while you choose how to dominate the arena.

name: Pirates of Rectangular
description: Pirates of Rectangular is a small indie game in which you fight against pirates in the Rectangular Seas on behalf of the Shape Alliance. Maneuver your ship as skillfully as possible and sink your opponents to end the discussions about the best shape of the geometric world once and for all!

name: The Monarch
description: The Monarch is a 3D lane-defence game where you control a monarch, expand your kingdom, and defend against The Evil Queen and her undead army by strategically managing gold resources, recruiting diverse units, and exploring a world filled with mythical threats.

name: The Midnight Crimes
description: Point-&-click detective adventure game, you are a retired private detective investigating the case of a missing child while facing his own past demons. Midnight Cove, the wicked Victorian city you live in, features semi-open world mechanics, side-quests, pets, character relationships and much more.

name: Wraithborn
description: Take a step and distance yourself from reality! Wraithborn is a unique action game offering a breathtaking VR experience in a magical world. You will find yourself inside a grand dungeon and embark on an adrenaline-filled adventure as you explore rooms, each with a different concept.

name: Protocol Delta
description: Protocol Delta is a fast-paced twin-stick arcade game with minimal aesthetics. Test your reflexes as you try to survive relentless waves of geometric enemies.

name: Spell Legion
description: A RTS/action RPG strategy game with the combination of a Top-down/Third person view, letting you to Command your Army with orders and increase it using buildings along all factions in a Unique Fantasy World.

name: American Christmas 2
description: Inspired by the nostalgic and magical feeling of Christmas as a kid, you'll feel immersed in a fantasy world reminiscent of those classic 2-D platformers you loved to play growing up.

name: Strange Shadow
description: This is a thrill adventure game where you run and hide from scary giant creatures.

name: Silicon Zephyr
description: Silicon Zephyr is a swarm-building adventure set in a land reclaimed by sand.

name: Castaway Coalition
description: Castaway Coalition is an immersive survival game set on a remote island. Struggle for survival, build a community, satisfy human needs, and navigate a world affected by a dynamic day-night cycle. Craft tools, erect shelters, and farm to outlive island life. Your survival story awaits!

name: Bonnie Bear Saves Frogtime
description: Bonnie’s self-worth is at an all-time low, and there’s only one thing that can fix it - a lovely game of Frogtime! Grab your toadbag and get ready to go on a hilarious adventure full of quirky characters, explorable islands, and way too many frogs.

name: Merged Gravity
description: Merged Gravity is a fun and challenging gravity based 2d platformer game where you control a ball on it's way to fix the core of the Space Station.

name: Illusion Within
description: Gabriel - A psychedelic horror detective game in which you have to stage Ragnarok to get your beloved back. Travel through the worlds of Scandinavia, destroying the giants of Jotun to fulfill your part of the deal promised to Loki, the god of perfidy. You will have to decide who to trust.

name: FrostPanic: Whispers of Sertão
description: FrostPanic: Whispers of Sertão is a suspenseful boomershoot set in a supernatural snowy sertão. Navigate through eerie environments, uncover secrets, and survive against otherworldly threats in a visually striking world inspired by Northeastern Brazil’s woodcut art.

name: No Border
description: No Border is an action-puzzle platformer where you manipulate each level borders to navigate your way through!

name: RaidKids
description: Still, the boy keeps walking.

name: Bullet
description: Bullet is a top down Action Arcade game. You have one shot at killing your enemies. Dodge and weave through each level, gain points and upgrade your abilities. You have one shot... Make it count.

name: Avalog
description: Chess, but continuous! Avalog is a free game for playing analog chess with others, either locally or online. As well as a 'classic' mode, there is a 'draft' mode, where players pick pieces from 5 different factions.

name: God Brawl
description: Take control of a fledgling religion and strike down the false gods of your enemies. God Brawl is a revival of the classic god game genre. The people need something to believe in, why shouldn't it be you?

name: Bobo Bay
description: Bobo Bay is a pet simulation game where you collect, mash(breed), accessorize, and train little creatures to compete in races and other competitions. You are able to feed your Bobo an old shoe which is kinda funny.

name: Bite Size Terrors: GuyGuy Toys
description: Welcome to GUYGUY Toys! As the new Employee, I hope you..you..you.. Learn How to Deliver Toys Happily!

name: Elemental Realms
description: Element Realm is a puzzle game with a magical adventure theme. The game tells the story of a wizard's adventure to the elemental world in order to protect the world. You play as a wizard, visit different worlds, use different magic to solve massive levels.

name: Lichbound
description: As the controlling influence of the Lich spreads across the Spirit Realm, a lone spirit's fury is ignited. Confront the shadowy Beasts and absorb their power as you fight your way through the Lich's domain to put an end to his tyranny.

name: Lucky Shield
description: Lucky Shield - a medieval beat 'em up in which the player is a living shield that absorb magic orbs to power up its attacks and recapture the continent from invaders and traitors.

name: Freedom is Piracy
description: Or, a young archeologist, leaves the continent to find the legendary pirate city: Alticia. This city exists and gathers pirates from the 4 corners of the world who are thirsty of freedom! Play solo or 4 players coop to evolve in a world as opened as rich as surprising. And watch out for the Marine!

name: Unsorted Horror
description:
UNSORTED HORROR is a collection of 5 short first-person horror games, that revolve around detailed machinery in a dark dystopian setting. The majority of the games have a playtime of roughly 10-15 minutes and can be played through in one sitting. Choose a CD case, read the backside, and go on a small adventure.

THE GAMES:
1. Tartarus Engine - A group of plucky technicians exploit an ancient machine's seemingly untapped vulnerability.
2. The Other Side - Operate a jury-rigged drill to secretly escape a corrupt bunker.
3. Control Room Alpha - Pull data from a nest of spiders.
4. Carbon Steel - Perform hazardous research in an abandoned facility.
5. Concrete Tremor - A game revolving around plastic explosives and soviet apartment buildings.

name: Amusement Park Simulator
description: This is a simulation-tycoon game for making your dream park.You can purchase , sell and move all of the machines and visual items.While you do these things costumers comes and experience all of this.Sometimes they wanna eat , watch and enjoy on machines.Becareful if they buy a ticket !

name: Astroventure: Unchartred Planet
description: Embark on a cosmic journey as Sophia, a brave heroine searching for her lost friend Olga. Explore uncharted worlds, encounter diverse races, and unravel cosmic mysteries. Will you find Olga amidst the depths of space? Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock new realms in this captivating adventure

name: Sealed Gate
description: Sealed Gate is a medieval fantasy RPG where you explore a huge world, meet different characters, fight monsters and choose your path.

name: Triple Treble Triumph
description: How many genres have you mastered? Is it enough to play 3 of them simultaneously? Triple Treble Triumph puts 27 games into 1. Accept its trial to prove how much of a Gamer you are.

name: Kitchen Crisis
description: Kitchen Crisis is a cooking defense game where you play as an abducted Earthling, serving dishes demanded by aliens to survive. Arrange cooking tools efficiently, upgrade ingredients and tools, and adapt to ever-changing recipes to stay alive!

name: Kejora
description: Kejora is a hand-drawn animated puzzle platformer adventure, tells the story of a girl named Kejora pursued by monstrous creatures after discovering a dreadful secret. She is accompanied by her friends who can assist her in overcoming obstacles and find the truth behind their peaceful village life.

name: Away From Home
description: A Rhythm based RPG experience. Providing detailed pixel art and expressive animation. Experience a fun world with lots of colorful characters. Come and disrupt their peace!

name: A Risen Heart
description: Court your favorite characters in this enchanting new dating simulator! Pay attention and make good choices, then maybe you can walk away with the man or woman of your dreams. Good luck!

name: Pickaxe Friends
description: Survival strategy of unanswered friends.

name: Dot to Dot Sweep
description: Go for the high score in this arcade-style color matching action game. Maneuver your character through fields of colored dots collecting those that match your color.

name: Mosa Lina
description: A hostile interpretation of the immersive sim, where nothing is planned, and everything works

name: Folktale Misfits
description: Folktale Misfits the card game roguelike where you play as outcasts looking for answers in a whimsical world. Develop strategies and help the misfit heroes unlock their true potential.

name: Iron Naval Battle
description: A sea of conflict, never back down. During the battle, you can switch any warship of your own side arbitrarily, a fast-paced naval battle game simulator. Let the shells roar, I am invincible.

name: Where I Belong
description: How hard is becoming friends with others? Explore the challenging dynamics of high school relationships in "Where I Belong," a compelling visual novel that delves into the complexities of friendship, toxicity, and the search for one's place in a crowded world.

name: Time Circuit
description: Deep integration of city builder and tower defense. Time is the most crucial resource in this world. Lead your clan to construct a base in the dazzling circuit world and fend off waves of enemy attacks!

name: Elemental Fury
description: Elemental Fury is a 4 player co-op action game inspired by the mythical setting of the ancient far east. Battle the waves after waves of legendary enemies with your friends for survival and treasures in online and hot-seat multiplayer.

name: Splash Out!
description: "Splash Out!" a high-speed action game that you can enjoy in a short time! to open up a world you've never seen before!

name: Sundown Survival
description: "Sundown Survival" is a heart-pounding top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Navigate an intense day-night cycle by crafting gear and fortifications during the day to fend off zombies at night. Survival meets Action-RPG: every decision, every upgrade matters. Can you make it till dawn?

name: Infernal Apocalypse: Rise of the Underworld
description: The first online RTS game based in Hell. As a low-rank demon, you and your friends build your own kingdom, manage slaves and resources, fight hordes of demons, and rise up the ranks until you meet Satan himself. After all, our eternal damnation is certain, so why not practice beforehand?

name: Realms and Ruins: Abencor
description: Realms & Ruins: Abencor is a first-person, grid-based, open world, retro, pixel art dungeon crawler harkening back to the days of yore. Realms & Ruins takes inspiration from games like Wizardry and Might & Magic and other cRPG's of the 90's.

name: Formation
description: Join the elite ranks of the 7th Flight Demonstration Squadron AKA the 'Bullsharks'. In wartime, the '7th' invoked fear in the hearts of the enemy. In peacetime, they thrill the citizens of the floating city of Ocea with daring formation routines. Hold your nerve and stay in formation!

name: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium
description: World Dai-star: Yume no Stellarium is a rhythm game for iOS and Android.

name: Disney's The Little Mermaid: Ariel's Majestic Journey
description: Take an exciting journey with Ariel, the beautiful and curious mermaid, and help make her dream come true! As kids explore the enchanting world under the sea, they engage in challenging games and activities that teach key school skills like vocabulary, counting, problem solving and more. Eight clever learning adventures take Ariel through her secret grotto, into a sunken boat and on a mission to save her trapped friends and her father King Triton!

name: Ava's Adventure
description: Ava's Adventure is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of Ava who has been chosen as a test subject for the secret CRR Corp. experiment in order to help him overcome his social anxiety and fulfill his desires.

name: Guerra Sangrenta
description: “Guerra Sangrenta” has many attracting game modes, with its unique optimization technique, such as Classic Competition, Casual Game, Adventure mode etc. Join to find all the wild gears and weapons for your taste, run through the storm of shots and shells. Exciting battles await you!

name: This Morning I Decided to Die
description: Follow a girl through the last day of her life.

name: Dere. Some Answers Before I...
description: Come back, for no one is waiting for you. Search for your memories - no one ever knew you. Destroy everything in your path - all around you are nothing but ruins. End the endless cycle, for it has long since closed in on itself.

name: Grim Tales: The Time Traveler
description: A time-traveling killer is taking out the Gray family, one by one.

name: Deru
description: This game is a Fantasy turn-based adventure game.

name: Only Ban!
description: You will go on an exciting journey, where you will be waiting for various Easter eggs, references, as well as difficult obstacles, platforms, mazes that require reaction and the ability to control your character. Strive to get to the very top the fastest to prove your superiority!

name: Rocococo: Audiogame Fantastique
description: Rocococo ~ Audiogame Fantastique is a music-based, singleplayer adventure that has no visuals and can be played by anyone from fully blind to fully sighted. Using just your ears and spatial audio tech, you must listen, discover, and re-assemble songs to help the robo-Butler defeat the evil Queen!

name: Carlos Klauss: Episode Zero
description: Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ is a Graphic Adventure with Visual Novel elements which introduces you to the life and history of Carlos Klauss and his misadventures.

name: Zero Degrees
description: This is a Third-person shooting indie game. Players will kill zombies, loot, complete quests, level up, and unlock new areas and AI teammates in a semi open map. The game includes day-night system, custom dressing, loot lost on death, and simple hivemind AI.

name: Milthm
