description: Rhythm in rains. Realization in dreams. "All the words, belong to a melody of rain. Resonating within ripples, dreams of human remain. Wading through unknown dreams, our understanding shall be gained..."

name: UVSU
description: Outsmart yourself, iteration by iteration. You alternate between playing as the hero and the enemies. There's no AI in this game- It's replaying what you did previous iterations.

name: Jolly Putt: Mini Golf & Arcade
description: The jolliest Mini Golf & Arcade Tycoon game! Design and Play your own courses. Manage arcade ticket prizes, food stalls, staff and much more to satisfy your park guest's every need. Customize, decorate and explore your park in first-person.

name: One S'More
description: Can you help your marshmallow friend to fulfill his dream of becoming a tasty S'More? One S'More is a challenging puzzle game, set in a tasty environment. Connect 2 chocolate biscuits and reach them with your marshmallow.

name: Bleak Frontier
description: Bleak Frontier is a strategy / city builder game set in a frozen wasteland in the far future, 4087 AD. As the chosen leader of the first permanent settlement in almost a century, you must guide the last survivors of the human race towards an uncertain future. Welcome to the Bleak Frontier.

name: Fire and Brim Co.
description: Embark on an epic adventure in this top-down action RPG! Take on the role of Ned, a disgruntled demon employee seeking to restore Hell's former glory. Confront your resistant manager, battle the 7 Sins and Satan, and make Hell great again in this thrilling demon-filled quest!

name: Elon vs AI
description: Elon vs AI is a 3D arena shooter in which you have to play as a warrior on a large arena, shooting persistent robots, gaining experience, improving skills, buying new weapons and fighting different types of robots.

name: Match War
description: Match War - This is a simple match-3 plus war game. The game has three ways to play: pass, defeat, and hold on. Players need to change the soldiers or heroes who fight to win.

name: Connect Lyrical Spectacle Forest
description: Leap to evade!! Action game!!

name: Kasplat
description:
Choose your dart, lock'n'load your color palette and rain colorful chaos in this brilliant bonanza of messy mayhem.
Fight for the high-score with multiple game modes, epic powerups and deeper strategy than meets the eye in Kasplat.

name: Collapsing
description:
Game1: Tap these colored blocks and at least 2 blocks of the same color are tied together. These same blocks will be eliminated.The more blocks you eliminate at one time, the higher the score you get
Game2: The blocks will increase from the bottom and lightly remove them. Don't let the block pile exceed the red line.
Game3: Each block has a number, the sum of the selected block numbers is equal to the sum of the upper left corner, then these blocks will be eliminated
Game4: Two-player game, the eliminated blocks will be added to the bottom of the block stack. Whoever surpasses the red line first fails

name: Beatmania IIDX 31 Epolis
description: A new arcade rhythm game from Konami.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Bat & Switch
description: The main focus of this game is using the bat and manipulating it to hit the ball to your advantage. The challenges consist of 5 levels of the following; basic hitting, tricky throws, multiple pitchers, hitting fastballs and taking out UFOs. The second set of challenges incorporates multiple of this aspect and tighter restrictions.

name: Stress, Out!
description: Stress, Out! is a Top Down Gore Shooter where you can use special abilities to destroy enemies to let some stress out.

name: Bootlegger's Racing Story
description: Step back in time to the roaring 1930s and immerse yourself in the high-stakes world of bootlegging during America's Prohibition era. Get ready to join John Hamerton, a retired car engineer and mechanic, as he embarks on a daring journey to save his house and pay off his tax debt.

name: Hack/ed
description: Join the famous game streamer PinkyPie as her world turns upside down with a mysterious message during what seemed to be a regular streaming night. Can you help her unravel the identity of the blackmailer and break free? Every choice counts. Shape your own storyline in this interactive FMV.

name: Pulse of Love
description: "Pulse of Love" is a captivating visual novel set in the vibrant world of the Korean K-pop scene drama. Experience the exhilarating journey of love, passion, and self-discovery as you navigate the highs and lows of fame.

name: Bullet Town
description: Fight waves of bandits in this crazy hybrid of shooter and roguelike: keep your cool and shoot at the right time, use the scenery to your advantage with surprising effects, claim bounties to upgrade your characters and become Bullet Town’s greatest gunslinger!

name: Starlab
description: Gather resources, travel between worlds, construct bases and manage power to construct your Starlab. Research lost technology to survive the hostile environments of humanities long abandoned sun.

name: Cursed Realm
description: In Cursed Realm, you play as an adventurer in search of mystical rune stones to lift a realm's curse. Your main task involves traveling, gathering clues, and winning the trust of NPCs. A journey full of challenges and uncertainties awaits. Are you ready?

name: An English Haunting
description: While looking for the existence of the Great Beyond, Professor Patrick Moore, aided by a fake medium, will build a device to see the other side, embark on a search for a millenary artefact, and investigate the most haunted manor of 1907 England.

name: Missing Kitty
description: Embark on a tranquil journey of discovery and reunion as you immerse yourself in this quest to find your beloved Missing Kitty. Unveil the secrets of enchanting environments as you seek out the Kitty's toys and her endearing companions hidden amidst the picturesque landscapes.

name: Heartrender
description: Welcome to the Null, a surrealist non-space between worlds, times and concepts, populated by outcasts and detritus from across existence. As a lone, self-serving agent of mayhem on a personal mission, sneak, brawl, shoot and swing your way through immersive, open-ended heists.

name: Ouros
description: Ouros is a calming puzzle game about forming beautiful curves in a serene environment.

name: Doughbee
description: A real time wave based roguelike about battling doodle creatures and collecting perks along the way, with ranging effects from elemental damage to things like rammer Doughbee and even a scorpion mech, see how far you can make it through this bullet hell of a nightmare.

name: Siren's Call: Escape Velocity
description: A surreal, coming-of-age visual novel set in early 2010s Central Florida, "Siren's Call" is the small town you swore you'd always leave. Something inside of you knows that this is your last chance. Will you reach escape velocity?

name: Pippin's Mysterious Garden
description: Explore the whimsical world of Pippin in this short, 2D adventure and exploration game. Traverse a wild garden, uncover secrets, discover treasures, and meet adorable NPCs in this enchanting storybook world.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Gear Games
description: Clean a glove, balance a ball on a bat and more in Gear Games.

name: Eye on the world
description: "Eye on the world" is an exploration adventure game where you will find various objects in a voxel diorama. Let's dive into the world of exploration!

name: Dreamscape Abyss
description: Dreamscape Abyss is a game where you explore the ever-changing and surreal worlds inside of your dreams. Collect items to help you discover even more obscure areas as you delve deeper into your dream world.

name: Homeless Guy
description: An out-of-place man wanders into a town with nothing but a photograph. Get employed, invest, join gangs, commit crime, and rise above in this cynical comedy.

name: Naturals
description: Naturals is an easy to learn, hard to master game of basic math on Natural numbers. Apply addition, subtraction, multiplication and integer division operations to your current value to end up with values that are allowed through logic gates in order to complete each level.

name: Lucy's Journey
description: Lucy's Journey is a visual novel where every decision counts. Discover the rich and complex world of Maana, where humans, divinities, titans, demons, and elves struggle for their destiny. Your journey begins now.

name: Charged!
description: Make over the top RC-Car commericials of the 90's a reality, in electrifying, movement intensive team based battles from a miniature perspective. Control modified RC-Cars, Helicopters and Aircraft, each equipped with unique DIY-weaponary and -gadgets, in highly immersive, detailed environments.

name: Red Genie: An Eidola Tale
description: Red Genie is a turn-based adventure RPG with a focus on weapon and magic variety, with the ability to swap between any one of ten equipped Weapons. This challenging game has a fantastical aesthetic and a rich soundtrack with a story found through player exploration!

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Volley Bats
description: Play a version of volleyball with sticks in this game.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Cage Match
description: Similar to Bat & Switch however there are different ways to receive extra points (hit a robot pitcher or hit high enough to hit the Home Run button).

name: Upside the Backrooms
description: Upside the Backrooms is a game created by the Chadi El-sayed World community, in which you find yourself in yellow rooms with the sound of constant light. You must try to escape and get through all the puzzles, avoiding the entities that could come and kill you.

name: Universal Conquest
description: 4X/Grand Strategy/RTS Hybrid Space Simulation based on principles - and developed in consultancy with - alien contactees.

name: Phantom Wardrobe
description: Explore a mysterious land infested with ghosts and creatures to find out the truth about your past. Collect hats with unique powers that can help you overcome challenges and change the way you play. There are many to secrets to uncover and evil creatures to defeat.

name: Spectral Trail
description: In this pseudo-3D action FPS, try to survive a maze full of ghosts in your search for the Seven Rings of Xeoncor.

name: Vinebound: Tangled Together
description: Vinebound: Bloom & Boom is a tasty mix of horde-survival roguelite and chaotic couch co-op for 1-2 players. Coordinate your position, synchronize attacks, and defeat hordes of moldy foes while unlocking new arsenals to cultivate plantastic builds.

name: Ruins and Refuge
description: Ruins and Refuge is a first person fantasy RPG dungeon crawler. Fight menacing beasts as you gather loot and rare materials. Select your class with weapon specialty and abilities. Gear up for your next adventure in up to 3 player co-op or face the danger ALONE!

name: Medieval Darkness
description: Join your friends and embark on an epic adventure to stop the undead from covering the world in darkness. Craft your custom village and characters, explore ancient dungeons, and defend neighboring towns against the undead invasion. Can you survive the ultimate showdown versus evil?

name: Heroes Suck
description: Defend your dungeon against an onslaught of heroes in this physics-enabled tower defense. Build your dungeon tile by tile, placing deadly traps to protect your loot. Upgrade your defenses and powers as you amass wealth and unleash havoc on these cheese wheel-stealing 'heroes'.

name: Tales of Wakana
description: "Tales of Wakana" is a thrilling action-adventure game like Galaxy Castlevania. Explore a mysterious and challenging world, battling monsters using magical skills. Uncover the true meaning of life, family bonds, and self-knowledge for an enlightening experience.

name: Herdles
description: Herdles is a heartwarming puzzle platformer that can be customized to fit your preferred play style. Be theist herding dog and ensure the safety of your flock in this delightfully whimsical, interactive world. Find your way while being vigilant and staying one step ahead of pesky predators.

name: SameShadow
description: SameShadow is a third-person ARPG that pits you against invading forces threatening your homeland. Unravel the mysteries behind this invasion as you “awaken” extraordinary powers of time, matter, and space within you through thrilling shooter-style or melee-focused combat.

name: Milord
description: Milord is a Kingdom Management RPG game with city building mechanics. You'll be left with hard choices for your fiefdom. Will you be able to rise to the occasion or lose your kingdom and life in the process.

name: Scrap Warden
description: Bring order to space in your own way in Scrap Warden! An epic action strategy through junk filled space missions and enemies. Explore various worlds, battle AI driven pirates and collect material to cobble together advanced weaponry and upgrades, all in a beautiful, and dangerous universe.

name: Abyssal Descent
description: Embark on an epic platforming adventure through treacherous caves and mysterious realms in Abyssal Descent. Battle enemies, solve puzzles, and unlock hidden secrets as you journey through procedurally generated underground worlds. With optional local co-op, share this adventure with a friend.

name: Vipertrace
description: Fight for survival! Industrial waste has disturbed the dangerous Kaeru-tori's habitat, forcing them into the city. Unlock new areas, purchase weapons and upgrades to grow stronger, and fight off the horde with your friends!

name: There's No Dinosaurs
description: There's No Dinosaurs is a hidden object game with a selection of 9 locations and random dinosaurs to find for each of them.

name: Voice Quest
description: Voice Quest, a 3D platformer, puts your voice in control. Guide Shadow Man through challenges, collect bananas, dodge strawberries, and compete for global records. Your adventure, your voice, your victory!

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Feel the Glove
description: Feel the Glove has the player play the various role of the fielder from catching pop flies to getting to a grounder.

name: I, Toaster
description: Defend your city from the appliance uprising! Play as a Rebellious Hero who is a neural networks backup file loaded into the toaster. Guns! Toaster!

name: Dark Data: Zero
description: A toxic catalyst has spread throughout Lower-Detroit, plunging the metropolis into a mutant infested nightmare. Can you uncover the origin of this heinous act? Face off against a plethora of undead and malevolent foes in this classics-inspired love letter to 90's console shooters.

name: Paper Can't Fly
description: Fly, Build & Share! Soar through the most challenging of levels and unleash your creativity by building your own. The sky is the limit!

name: Dead Wolf
description: „Dead Wolf” is a psychological thiller that introduces players into the world of paralyzing fear, vision of the end of the world and desperate will to survive.

name: Eydigard
description: Eydigard is a coop RPG drawing from Scandinavian and Sami folklore. As an adventuring shapeshifter, you're tasked to reclaim and cleanse farmlands infected by a relentless plague, while navigating the intricate politics of rival clans. Each decision impacts your path and the world around you.

name: Mushroom Picnic Party
description: Help find little mushrooms and prepare for an epic picnic party in this cute hidden object game!

name: Magician's Cat Diary
description: You are a magician living in seclusion in a modern big city. You live by running an old flower shop. One day, you saved a Feral cat from falling from the roof with the magic of the wind. Since then, in addition to raising flowers, several naughty kittens have gradually entered your life

name: Stilt
description: A VR platformer with unique movement, inspired by classic platformers. Arm yourself with stilts and use your quick reflexes and problem-solving skills to succeed in single player adventure or PvP multiplayer.

name: The Reluctant Redemption of Verity Lux
description: Unravel the mystery behind the disappearance of Druhyus' favorite celebrity playboy, Walker Kahmenos. Join investigative journalist Verity Lux, follow leads in the town's seedy underbelly, conduct interviews, and submit your findings as custom articles to seek out the truth before it's too late.

name: Heart Heroes: Wolf Knight
description: Heart Heroes: Wolf Knight is an action-adventure precision/puzzle platformer. Dash your way through challenging obstacles. Fight off the enemies. Find the lost Hearts. Guide them safely home. Defeat the Wolf King and his minions. Collect hard-to-get fireflies along the way.

name: Path of Soul
description: "The first story of the inevitable blood feud between the Demon Society and Earth God Entertainment!" - Become the protagonist of Earth God Entertainment and enjoy a 2D flying shooter game composed of differentiated patterns.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: The Aim Game
description: Use the 3DS gyroscope to the throw balls at targets.

name: Hammer of Pain
description: Hammer Of Pain. Dive into a pixel-art, medieval adventure with Silver, the master blacksmith, and his huntress daughter, Nora. Their riveting tale of courage and heritage awaits you. Unfold their story, savor the detail, and get hooked on their world!

name: Liberty Belle
description: In this bite-sized 3D Platformer adventure, a villain has unleashed havoc across the United States! It's up to the heroic LIBERTY BELLE to put a stop to his plans!

name: With Them: Frontlines
description: Experience 'With Them: Frontlines', the pinnacle of military FPS games. Dive into intense multiplayer matches with unmatched realism, tactical 10v10 warfare, and dynamic combat scenarios. Unlock in-game emblems representing veteran charities. The battlefield awaits. Engage today!

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Drop & Pop
description: Match buttons to tires to make the tower smaller. Knock all of them as fast as you can.

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Make the Call
description: Make the Call has the player play as the umpire and call the pitches. This is one of the 2 games you can get a demo out of (with just the first 6 Challenges). The demo is unlocked by buying 3 other key games.; once you buy the full version for $4.00 or $2.00 after haggling with Rusty, the demo will be replaced with the full version.

name: Queen's Domain
description: Explore a mysterious island filled with secrets in this combat and traversal focused retro-inspired Action RPG.

name: Ontotis
description: Ontotis is a psychological horror game focusing on atmosphere, mystery and an engaging story. Uncover scattered clues to unveil the chilling fate of the house's residents, while encountering a mysterious humanlike figure seemingly connected to them in their haunting tale.

name: Rabbicent Adventures
description: Here you have to make your way through various obstacles to get to the rabbit castle, on the way you will have a lot of adventures and confrontations with various enemies, use your hare agility and quickness to overcome them.

name: Roguenarok
description: Roguenarok is a top-down action roguelite arena shooter where you play as a mighty viking dinosaur, fighting back extinction from alien invaders. Strategize your counter-attack against diverse enemies by carefully considering the best warrior, weapon, and item to select and build.

name: Takoyaki Surprise
description: Journey to Restaurant Island to save the Octopus Princess from being cooked on live TV by the evil celebrity chef, Shefu, in this thrilling point-and-click action game!

name: Rusty's Real Deal Baseball: Bat Master
description: Bat Master has the player customize bats to use in other games.

name: Escape from the Nursing Home
description: Dry mouth, arthritis and poor eyesight? That is not surprising, because you're an old man! It doesn't matter how you ended up in the nursing home, it matters how you get out of it!

name: Pawn Planet
description: You've in charge of managing the pawn shop in this weird galaxy. Make deals with strange customers, flip items, attend auctions and keep the shop going!

name: Bungo Bash
description: Bungo Bash is a juicy, multiplayer, arena fighter where chunky animal champions known as Bungos, dash, bounce and bash each other off the arena until one remains.

name: Steam Panic
description: Award-winning steampunk puzzle game in which you spin the playfield to match the blocks in the box and solve Schrödinger's cat riddle.

name: The Shape Killer
description: Take on the role of a sniper and get paid to eliminate high-profile targets, find and defuse bombs, massacre civilians, eliminate dangers, explore 70+ missions. Sometimes be a hero, sometimes be an assassin! Start as a novice shooter, turn pro, unlock new game modes and become a legend.

name: Ball King Jam
description: Join with friend or play solo against enemies in this silly physics-based take on basketball. Use trampolines, boosts or catch pigeons to help you win the game. Visit fun locations like pirate ship or stick to the cool street courts and show of your dunking skills!

name: Guncade
description: Guncade is a 1980's arcade lovers dream, if that dream also involves being an arms dealer to grannies, clowns, and other suspicious people. Journey through this visual novel and decide who to cater to and who can buzz off.

name: Battlecore Robots
description: Customize your own mech: Use swords, bombs and all kind of weapons to defeat your oponents in frenetic battles with unique abilities! Play up to 4 players locally or online with Steam Remote Play. Enter the Battlecore arena!

name: Sphere Shootout
description: "Blue Warrior 4" is a 2D cover tactical shooting game. The key to win in the game is not the shooting technique but the tactical walking.

name: Conquered Dread
description: Conquered Dread is a First Person survival horror game where the player is a young man who is trying to save his friend from a cave. Choose your path to explore places full of paranormal events and notes written by victims.

name: Kemps
description: Kemps is a fast-paced online card game that brings together 4 to 8 players, divided into teams of 2, where players score points by secretly communicating to their partner when they have collected 4 of a kind. Utilize teamwork, deception, and keen observation to pave the way to victory!

name: Vanova's Stories
description: Vanova’s Stories is a goofy Point & Click game in which you take on the role of a unique detective on a quest to solve a crime in cooperation with your friends. Interact with suspects and collect clues that only you can obtain.

name: The Braves
description: Demolish hordes of enemies and survive against all odds! Unlock different characters, find powerful skill combinations and embark on an exciting journey through the variety of very different worlds in this cute but unforgiving roguelike game!

name: Asteroid Colony
description: In this real time strategy city builder game you will help humanity reaching beyond earth by establishing a permanent and thriving settlement in the asteroid belt. Settling in space comes with enormous challenges and dangers, which you will have to guide your people through

name: Crystal Void
description: Crystal Void takes a new twist on puzzle classics like Tetris and Pipe Dream with rogue-lite elements and retro sci-fi aesthetics. Race against the spreading crystal infection in numerous challenges or play in relaxed endless modes at your own pace.

name: Plenty Karts
description: Make your way through over 20 tracks as you attempt to become the new champion of the Plenty Karts league. Mixing together the concept of classic kart racing games with side-scrollers, Plenty Karts is a nonstop action kart racer with 16 difficulty levels and a full story mode.

name: Kobold Castle
description: Kobold Castle is a 2D arena survival game that takes place on the wall of a besieged castle. As one of 4 kobold defenders, you must hold the line against dangerous waves of attackers, collect upgrades and powerups, and defeat a variety of enemies and bosses. Try to survive as long as you can!

name: Magic Inn
description: Reclaim glory in Magic Inn, a charming tavern life simulator. Take on the role of an exiled wizard-turned-innkeeper, overseeing everything from menus, rooms, guests, and staff in a fully magical customizable inn. Engage in card battles to spark conversations and foster relationships with guests.

name: Thrift Shop
description: Thrift Shop is a casual, thrift shopping simulation game. You start with an empty workshop and a full wallet of Thrift Coins. Your mentor, Papa Pinchpenny, teaches you how to navigate thrift stores, find unique items, resell for profit, and complete quests that unlock stores and skills.

name: Sushi Ben
description: Featuring exciting 3D manga panels, Sushi Ben is a narrative adventure game where you have to save your favorite Sushi restaurant from going out of business by convincing the local town’s folk to eat there with you.

name: Go Banana
description: If you thought, "Wow, another weird game came out...", you're sharp! Feel like you're watching a B-movie, grab some cola and popcorn and get through this silly game! Get ready to throw your mind, time and money down the drain. And now you too, let's Go! Banana! to this crazy world!

name: After Light Fades
description: A mystical, magical puzzle game about letting go. After the loss of her beloved partner, Alice is left with seven emotionally resonant artefacts. She embarks on a journey to revisit seven of their favourite places and cast each artefact into an abyss, so she can finally be free

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing
description:
Twenty of the most iconic DreamWorks Animation characters take the wheel in the fast-paced world of kart racing in DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing!

Shift, drift and jump at high speeds across a variety of fantastical tracks inspired by DreamWorks Animation’s many fan-favorite films. Blaze past the competition in fun and hilarious action for players of all ages with solo as well as online and local split-screen multiplayer modes.

name: Niktophobia
description: Niktophobia is a Sci-fi PC and VR horror for 1-4 players. The team arrives at the space station to extract alien bio-samples. Confronting an advanced alien AI, players will use various tools and manipulate the station's energy to get out of trouble together

name: Koloss
description: Enter the arena! Outwit your opponents in fast-paced real-time battles. The makers of Soldiers of Anarchy bring you a real-time multiplayer game that will keep you on your toes. Jump into battle against players from all over the world!

name: Gladiator Immortal
description: Gladiator Immortal is a turn-based fantasy Gladiator Rougelike game where you manage a team of Gladiators who fight for the glory of the gods. Build up your town, hire and level up gladiators, find powerful weapons and armour, learn and develop new skills and win favour with the gods.

name: Carnage Cuisine
description: You are a banana with a gun! Blast your way through hordes of evil cooks and machines in this survivors-like, action rogue-lite. Collect loot, unlock powerful skills, rally your food allies, and lead them to victory! If you fail, upgrade your character and skills, and rise stronger for the next run!

name: Detective Dotson
description: Chase down criminals, spy on bad guys and solve cases! Change into a disguise or recruit a team member - your choices matter! Enjoy multi-genre gameplay and watch thrilling episodes. Games and stories from the endlessly intriguing modern day India!

name: Summoned Hero
description: Survive waves of monsters, collect gold, upgrade your hero, unlock spells and fight for victory in an exciting action RPG game.

name: Explore the Backrooms
description: A backrooms game full of story puzzles, monsters and places to explore.

name: QB-3
description: You are trapped in a space cube and must shoot points and stars of light. After clearing one side of the cube, you rotate it to get to the next wave.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess Multiplayer
description: A multiplayer mod for local multiplayer The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess.

name: Jake Everest 2: Gunung Padang The Unseen Civilization
description: Embark on another epic journey with adventurer and archaeologist Jake Everest! His latest endeavor leads him to a mysterious object inscribed with ancient runes! He boards a plane to investigate the connection when he recognizes matching runes at the Gunung Padang archaeological site. His efforts alongside the archaeological team will lead them to discover lost secrets beyond anything they ever imagined! Come along for a match-3 journey for all time!

name: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder
description: Sym.Bios: Torn Asunder is a text-based visual novel with tricky moral choices and beautiful art. Its epic sci-fi story is told through vivid dialogue, featuring 7 main characters. All your decisions will have consequences down the line: will you succeed in your mission?

name: Tenbin no La Dea: Ikusa Megami Memoria
description:
This title is the continuation of the Ikusa Megami series and is a remake of the original title from 1999. Celica Sylphil obtained the body of a goddess by slaying her. As a result, he was chased by gods and nations, and hunted by assassins until the ‘water miko’, the guardian saint of the holy nation of Rewinia. During the Battle of Dounel, he lost almost all of his divine power while defeating the evil dragon Aracale. Rewinia was saved, but he had become a soul-less female body.

Before he had time to recover his wounds, the ‘water miko’ requested that he head to the Rerun area to investigate the disappearance of the princess of Rewinia 18 years ago. Following the Rewinian order of knights who had left before him, he arrived to find a giant labyrinth. Will he be able to uncover the truth and regain his lost power?

name: Office Affairs
description: Office Affairs is an immersive visual novel game that takes players on an exciting journey through the complex world of office romance. Navigate through a thrilling web of love, ambition, and personal growth as you juggle multiple love interests and strive for success in the professional realm.

name: Space Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Witch Hunter Izana
description: Witch Hunter Izana is a bite sized transformation RPG! Take control of a zealous hunter sent to assess an island cut off from the outside world. Joined by a Knight-Errant and a Hedge-Witch, Izana will hack, slash, and shoot to release the island from the transformative grasp of sinister monsters.

name: System Purge: Hollow Point
description: Faced with a horrifying tragedy, you must delve into a flowering realm of memories and nightmares to save your dead lover. SYSTEM PURGE - Hollow Point is a massive expansion which adds a surreal new campaign, challenging new gamemodes, and more.

name: Saeko: Giantess Dating Sim
description: You opened your eyes to find a giant girl looking down at you. Experience the fate of Saeko and the little people in this cruel yet captivating story with avant-garde art.

name: Lust's Cupid
description: Lust’s Cupid is a scene based simulation game where you can interact with characters and control their movements inside scenes. Customize your characters, choose a sex position you want to have them in and start blasting!

name: Yuying Mansion
description: A casual simulation game that allows players to live with beautiful women and play Tetris together, achieving points and receiving praise from the other party. Players can move to the character's area to chat or play a Tetris game. You can make a beautiful woman undress and reveal her body.

name: Sugar Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: BeadsPopper
description: BeadsPopper is a casual tile-matching puzzle game with a simple RPG element. Battle against adorable monster girls by popping colorful beads!

name: Sweety Girls
description: Sweety Girls is an erotic visual novel in which you have to meet three enchanting beauties. Learn recipes for delicious desserts and choose the one you want to spend an evening alone with. Cook, seduce the girls and have fun!

name: Monster Island
description: Become a Harem Master and breed a lot of cute and sexy monster girls on Monster Island!

name: Dare to Desire: Season 1
description: A young man working a dead-end job decides he wants something greater out of life. He quickly finds himself chasing toward bigger and better things, through amazing discoveries and terrible heartbreak. Follow his journey to try and become rich, loved, respected and magnetic to women everywhere!

name: Fresh Force Frustrations: A Gay Superhero Erotic Visual Novel
description: A creature attacks Fresh Force headquarters, leaving the team trapped, unable to get physically aroused, and with a traitor in their midst. Get back your ability to get off! Multiple endings, steamy gay action, plus spandex, tentacles, and more!

name: Sex Simulator: Locker Room
description: An interactive sex simulation game featuring visual novel elements, high definition graphics and videos, and realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of a guy who has to share the locker room with other hot women.

name: Lovey-Dovey Lockdown
description: You and your former college crush have been locked in a room through divine intervention. The only way out is for you to…

name: Way of the Hunter: Tikamoon Plains
description: Venture out into this exotic new hunting ground in the heart if Africa. Enjoy a new hunting adventure, using a broad range of equipment, now also including Bows, and meet wild animals like Buffalo, Hyena, Wildebeest, Honeybadger and Gemsbok.

name: The Suits Have Gone Mad!: The Upper Class
description: Experience the second chapter in the newest cult-hit episodic horror, The Suits Have Gone Mad!After stumbling across color, Theo Blue sets out to retrieve the presentation that caused the Suits to turn against him.

name: Milk Me Darling: Tits Fairy
description: Milk Me Darling: Tits Fairy (all characters are 18+ and no character get hurt in this video game), sex Simulator where you will be able to penetrate penis to vagina and make a great pleasure to make the vagina squirt

name: SOS OPS!
description: Attention, heroes! Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become an integral part of an elite rescue team? Step into the boots of an emergency firefighter in this thrilling multiplayer game and experience the adrenaline-pumping world of high-stakes firefighting.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Street Art 2
description: Puzzles of street art!

name: Age of Wonders 4: Eldritch Realms
description: The Age of Wonders 4: Eldritch Realms expansion opens portals to realms filled with arcane marvels and unspeakable horrors. New forces threaten the rule of the Godir of Magehaven. New story content, strange monsters, new racial forms, magical realms and locations bring a new dimension to the game.

name: Sarge
description: Sarge is a top-down shooter. The goal is to stop the invading terrorists by controlling a tank and a helicopter. All enemy forces must be destroyed in each level. Two-player mode facilitates gameplay by adding two more units on the battlefield.

name: Mad Ball v2.0
description: Mad Ball v2.0 it's an Arkanoid clone but when you finish a level a sensual silhouette appears.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 3 - Deep Sleep
description: A decrepit orphanage known as Playcare sits beneath the once magical toy factory. You must make your way through this haunted place, solving new puzzles and avoiding the nightmares that lurk within the dark. Answers lie between the blood-stained bedsheets and screaming echoes... If you can survive.

name: Lead
description:
Lead is a fast paced Atari 2600 shooter that will keep you on your toes! There are four types of stages: "Fire", in which you must shoot enemies down. "Dodge" where you must dodge asteroids plummeting towards you. "Scramble" where you must avoid sentinels. And "Catch" stages where you must catch satellites. There are Smart Bombs and Power-ups you can capture to help you in your goal to stay alive!

Lead also features two variations: Lead 1K, which is a simpler 1K version of the game (only one stage type), and Lead 4K, which features two stage types.

name: Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner - Special Edition
description:
Zone of the Enders: The 2nd Runner - Special Edition was released in both Europe and Japan after the North American release of the vanilla version. This version of the game includes several minor game improvements and few extras :

- New difficulties Super Hard (Japan version) and Extreme
- Graphical and framerate enhancements
- A couple of new 3DCG cutscenes
- New battle sequences at certain parts of the game
- New extras missions
- Mechs in VS. mode consume subenergy when using special attacks
- Added subweapon practice simulations and explanations in VR Training mode

name: Iljimae-jeon: Manpa Sikjeok-pyeon
description: Sin descripción

name: Today I Went on a Quest
description: A curse has fallen on Magi Burger! Three employees decide to head into the store on a day they're not scheduled to save their coworkers from the evil that has struck them.

name: Plant World
description:
Help save the vegetables from the Angry Pumpkins!
Use your arrow keys to move your good pumpkin through PlantWorld. Follow the instructions on the screen to win keys and play games that will help you release the vegetables and win the game!

name: Hiatari Ryoukou!
description: A visual novel based on the anime series Hiatari Ryoukou released for PC-88.

name: One Creek: The House
description: When it's storming outside, and mom and dad are out at work, there's not a whole lot to do.

name: Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki
description: The PlayStation 2 version of Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki includes improved graphics, a new CG opening, and a new world map. It also features two additional female characters.

name: Barbie as the Island Princess
description: Nintendo DS port of Barbie as the Island Princess.

name: Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki - Best Version
description: A second release of the PS2 port of Dousoukai: Yesterday Once More / Friends: Seishun no Kagayaki, now with a Cero 15 rating.

name: Barbie as the Island Princess
description: GBA port of Barbie as the Island Princess.

name: Barbie: Groom and Glam Pups
description: Nintendo DS port of Barbie: Groom and Glam Pups.

name: Barbie: Groom and Glam Pups
description: Sin descripción

name: Kawaii Pet Shop Monogatari 2
description:
Similar to its predecessor, this is an animal-raising RPG adding more animals and improvements.

The protagonist's father, who runs a pet shop, goes missing after a shipwreck. The protagonist takes over the pet shop management and embarks on an adventure with her exceptional pets to find clues about her father's whereabouts.

name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon - Stealth Force Edition
description: Wii version of Transformers: Dark of the Moon - Stealth Force Edition.

name: Scarlett
description: A visual novel by NekoNeko for PC.

name: Scarlett: Nichijou no Kyoukaisen
description: A port of Scarlett originally on PC, adds a new chapter.

name: Dennou Tenshi: Digital Ange
description: An Adventure game released in Japan in 1993.

name: Digital Ange: Dennou Tenshi SS
description:
A simulation game developed by Koga Game Factory and published by Tokuma Shoten Intermedia for the Sega Saturn.

This is a reimagining of an earlier Super CD-ROM² game from 1994, Dennou Tenshi: Digital Ange.

name: Pocket Family: Happy Family Plan
description: A Strategy game, developed and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Gudetama Tap! Puzzle
description: A mobile puzzle adventure game.

name: Panchin is Frustrated
description:
You are the all-seeing observer of a pair of roommates, Panchin and Julem. Panchin is an artist struggling with creative block, and thus spends most of their time pacing around the room, or staying distracted.

Click to collect Panchin's Tears of Frustration. The amount of Tears collected during the day affects Panchin's dreams at night.

name: Heart of the Woods: Collector's Edition
description: Kickstarter-exclusive box that comes with the game, original soundtrack, and a custom box along with other goodies like a fairy keychain, postcard, digipak, and enamel pin.

name: Umisen Yamasen
description:
Main character hurries to leave home town after graduating from high school.
One day father priest sends him a telegram and asks to come back. Town has turned into an almost extinct village over this time. Father asks protagonist to get rid of the spirit of sea and mountains that drive away all the fish and attract beasts. But the way to awaken power and drive away the spirits is to have sex with them.

name: Jake Everest: Wakanga The Unseen Civilization
description: Renowned archaeologist Jake Everest has found that recovering stolen and lost artifacts is a rewarding use of his skill and expertise. His good deeds have earned him a fantastic reputation worldwide, and many have called upon him for help. His latest case takes Jake to a small mining colony in Papua where a mysterious plane crash nearby has caused unrest in the workers and is disrupting operations. Can you help Jake unravel the mystery and return peace to this small civilization? Adventure awaits!

name: Squidding Over It
description: Get as high as you can with this slippery and clumsy squid. But be careful that if you stumble you may slip back to where you started!!

name: Run Away
description: Fight against nightmares and survive in a cooperative horror game for 1-3 players. Explore dark locations, and gather resources for survival. Your decisions determine the fate of the heroes and reveal the secrets of this sinister world. Only through teamwork can you conquer this nightmare.

name: Adverse Effects
description: Judith has been having issues sleeping, so her solution was to see her doctor. The doctor prescribed her some new sleeping pills that have some Adverse Effects. You play the recipient of these feelings; what will you do when her normal affections turn into something more?

name: PriPri
description: "PriPri" is an ADV game where you explore maps, interact with characters, and uncover an escape plan as a prison staff member. Choose to befriend female prisoners and aid in the escape or ignore it, all while enjoying a relaxed gameplay experience without quest markers or time limits.

name: Lunar maiden, River-side Angel, and the Godlike Moment
description: "I make you real." Only he knows me. The identity of the young man who thought so was a serial killer. An 18+ novel game for maidens where a woman obtains divinity along with her ruin.

name: Zombikini PinballZ
description: It might be the zombipocalypse but at least the pinball machines still function.

name: Monster Line of Defense
description: "Monster Line of Defense" is a casual shooting game. Clicking the left mouse button allows the player to fire and shoot the monsters approaching from the front.

name: Love Tavern 2: Beastmen Kingdoms
description: After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different staffs from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.

name: 2022 A Doom Odyssey
description: 2022ado is a Boom/MBF compatible megawad (seriously a mega megawad) for the Ultimate Doom. It is a tribute to the original 2002ado released 20 years ago but with all new maps and music. The megawad has taken over 5 years to create.

name: Doom 2 In Spain Only
description: "Doom 2" is only released in Spain. It is vanilla compatible megawad with "Doom 2" and all applicable source ports. It has 32 exciting new levels of destruction. These famous authors include Juan Romero, El Pedersen and South America McGee.

name: Altars of Madness
description: Altars of Madness is a set of 12 Doom 2 maps in Boom format created by me over the course of a few months. The target source port is prboom+ but we tested in a variety of sourceports. The maps are relatively small and can be beaten in under 10 minutes. Each map is designed to be pistol started, and a death exit is placed at the end of each map to force this (sorry continuous players).

name: Victoria 3: Melodies for the Masses Music Pack
description: Victoria 3 has a new music pack inspired by the romantic yearnings for those simpler days of working on the land. This nearly hour long collection of original music is a concert honoring the daily struggles and ambitions of the common people.

name: Victoria 3: Sphere of Influence
description: In a more civilized age, the pen is supposed to be mightier than the sword. The first major expansion for Victoria 3 increases the depth and immersion of the diplomatic game. Build Power Blocs to protect regional interests, invest in foreign economies and interfere in your subjects' politics.

name: Victoria 3: Dawn of Wonder
description: From the glory of the sunrise to the glow of the gas lamp, this Art Pack takes the theme of light and shadow to add new life to the visual experience. A day-night cycle marks the time you spend in game, and other images shine with new life as the dawn of a new age is reflected in the art itself.

name: Victoria 3: American Buildings Pack
description: In many ways, the 19th century was the American Century - continental expansion, rapid population growth, and the stirring of an overseas empire. This pack includes unique building models for the United States, special American designs for other structures and the American Capitol Building as a landmark.

name: A Night in Prison
description: You come to your senses in a cell that looks like you are in some kind of prison. It's almost silent, but sometimes there are some sounds.

name: The Tower on the Borderland
description: A survival-horror game inspired by Super Metroid and The House on the Borderland.

name: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking
description: Basics In Intermediate Filmmaking is a pre-apocalyptic puzzle horror. You explore an abandonded power plant in order to document what happened to the infamous Fortitude Electric power company. Use your camera to solve different puzzles around the facility, and try to survive.

name: Wanderer's Sigil
description: Wanderer’s Sigil is a turn-based roguelike RPG with a unique dice management system. Embrace the role of the courageous team of Wanderers in a realm scarred by mystical devastation. Manage your caravan, traverse the unknown, reclaim forgotten knowledge, and fight to survive!

name: Save My Human
description: This is the story about a little girl who is taken to an evil world inside a video game, and her dog embarks on an adventure to save her. The dog will not be alone, he will encounter other pets who are also searching for their owners.

name: Robinson Alchemy
description: Robinson Alchemy is an alchemy game set on a deserted island where the objects you connect are the ones you first need to find and harvest.

name: Ponk's Jam: The Tulip Thief
description: Guess who’s back, dudes and gally?! In an all new universe, Ponk is here to save the world of Obal from the threat of The Tulip Thief! Embark on a huge journey through 6 crazy environments to retrieve the Artefacts from the 5 Kingpins; and also meet hilarious characters along the way.

name: Fallen Symphony
description: The world of Fallen Symphony is full of heated battles, engaging puzzles, and fearsome dungeons. Prepare yourself for a unique battle system which is inspired by brawlers from late 90s and gameplay based on the JRPGs of old.

name: Edge Road
description: Edge-Road is an action game that tells the story of an ordinary student who becomes the most famous and popular person in his school. Help students, become a local vigilante, and experience a school life worthy of an 'Edgelord'.

name: Kitchen Madness
description: Kitchen Madness is a frantic deck-building kitchen management game for the strategic solo player. As the head chef, you must assemble recipes, juggle ingredients, and manage unexpected events to whip up delicious dishes before the ticking clock sends your customers away hungry.

name: Dashgunner 0
description: Dashgunner is a single player FPS with stylized graphics and high mobility fast-paced gameplay. Player can grapple, slide, dash and traverse freely across various levels while engage in high-speed combat.
